review: Intricate, richly sweet-savory. Apple cider, salted caramel, basil, freesia, graphite in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Complex, lingering, flavor-laden finish.

Richly floral, high-toned. Wisteria, dried peach, cocoa nib, tangerine, oak forest in aroma and cup. Delicately tart acidity; plush, silky mouthfeel. A resiny myrrh-like note emerges in the flavor-saturated finish.

Delicately sweet, gently herbaceous. Cocoa nib, agave syrup, pansy, cedar, grapefruit in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Rich cedar notes support cocoa nib and grapefruit in the finish.

Delicate, tropical, cocoa-toned. Cocoa nib, passion fruit, bergamot, amber, wild honey in aroma and cup. Juicy, malic acidity; smooth, very satiny mouthfeel. The finish fulfills the promise of the cup with rich aromatics that linger.
Richly sweet-savory. Ripe tomato, red currant, candied walnut, cedar, narcissus in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, flavor-saturated, very long finish.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Brunca Rivense La Guaca Passion Honey
review: Richly chocolaty and fruit-forward. Dark chocolate, finger lime, lychee, almond, freesia in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart structure with citric acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of Dark chocolate and lychee.

Lushly sweet, rich-toned, balanced. Cocoa nib, gardenia, honeydew melon, sandalwood, allspice in aroma and cup. Juicy, sparkling acidity; vibrant, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, perfumed, engaging and very long finish.

Balanced, deep-toned. Dark chocolate, praline, narcissus, tangerine, olive oil in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Citrus and olive-like herbaceousness support a chocolaty finish.

Brightly sweet, richly tart, deep-toned. Bing cherry, lemongrass, pomelo, agave syrup, frankincense in aroma and cup. High-toned, juicy acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Long, flavor-saturated, complex finish.

Very sweet, crisply cocoa-toned. Date, cocoa powder, Meyer lemon zest, agave syrup, oak in aroma and cup. Pert acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by Meyer lemon zest and oak.

Richly spice-toned, gently floral. Bergamot, hop flowers, guava, oak forest, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. High-toned, sweetly citric acidity; vibrant, very silky mouthfeel. Flavor-saturated, confidently aromatic, inviting and long finish.

coffee_name: Colombia Finca Al Paraiso Y–05 Lychee
review: Richly sweet-tart, fruit-driven. Rambutan, candied violet, ginger blossom, bittersweet chocolate syrup, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy-tart acidity; very full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Complex, multi-layered, exceptionally long finish.

Balanced, richly sweet, nuanced and complex. Dark chocolate, candied violet, salted caramel, sandalwood, jasmine in aroma and cup. Gently bright, sparkling acidity; very full, satiny mouthfeel. Resonant, integrated, satisfying finish.

Very rich, very sweet, complex and multilayered. Amber, dried nectarine, almond butter, graphite, wisteria in aroma and cup. Balanced, malic (apple-like) acidity; plush, very syrupy mouthfeel. Lingering finish consolidates to notes of nectarine and amber.

Richly sweet, berry-toned. Mulberry, tamarind, mustard seed, candied violet, lemongrass in aroma and cup. Crisp, briskly sweet acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Berry-laden finish propped up by notes of tangy tamarind and richly savory-spicy mustard seed.

Chocolaty, berry-toned, very rich and deep. Chocolate fudge, salted caramel, dried strawberry, freesia, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Richly chocolaty, long-lingering, berry-toned finish.

Quietly confident, fruity and cocoa-toned. Orange creamsicle, cocoa nib, candied violet, hazelnut, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Gently bright acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish with sweet herb and citrus undertones.

Rich-toned, deeply sweet. Dark chocolate, toffee, narcissus, Bing cherry, mesquite in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; viscous, satiny mouthfeel. Exceptionally long finish that carries over all the flavor and aroma notes from the cup.

coffee_name: Guatemala Retiro del Quisaya Washed Process
review: Rich-toned, deeply sweet, complex. Black cherry, nutmeg, dark chocolate, amber narcissus in aroma and cup. Bright, malic acidity; very full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Flavor-saturated finish consolidates to notes of dark chocolate and nutmeg.

Richly sweet-savory, nuanced and aromatic. Candy apple, almond nougat, hop flowers, frankincense, baking chocolate in aroma and cup. Even-keeled acidity; mouth-filling, viscous body. Richly bittersweet finish with notes of candy apple and hops.

Reviewed for brewed applications. Chocolaty, gently bright. Date, milk chocolate, crisp pear, sassafras, hint of gardenia. Round, gentle acidity; creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty, sweetly herbaceous finish.

coffee_name: Panama Altieri Luci Geisha Natural Cold Dry Ferment
review: Complex, deep-toned, richly sweet. Juicy Fruit gum, tangerine, chocolate fudge, narcissus, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity, plush syrupy mouthfeel. Multilayered finish goes on and on.

Bright, balanced, juicy-sweet. Cocoa nib, strawberry guava, cashew butter, pink peppercorn, lemongrass in aroma and cup. High-toned, malic acidity; very smooth, satiny mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish with notes of lemongrass and pink peppercorn.

Deep-toned, richly sweet. Baking chocolate, date, cashew, fresh-cut fir, orange zest in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Crisp finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and fir.

Richly aromatic, deeply sweet. Wisteria, hazelnut, dark chocolate, date bar, Meyer lemon zest in aroma and cup. Sparkling (phosphoric) acidity; viscous, satiny mouthfeel. Crisp chocolate and sweet florals carry the pleasing finish.

Richly sweet-savory, classic Kenya profile. Cocoa nib, pink grapefruit zest, tomato vine, blackcurrant, redwood in aroma and cup.Sparkling acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Finish centers around notes of Cocoa nib and tomato vine.

Richly sweet, deep-toned. Nutella, mandarin, red plum, marjoram, cedar in aroma and cup. Gentle, balanced acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Aftertaste is quite aromatic, leads with notes of cedar and Nutella.

Very sweet, deep-toned, earthy. Petrichor, molasses, almond butter, candy apple, cedar in aroma and cup. Soft, round acidity; plush, fluffy-satiny mouthfeel. Sweet tobacco finish with cedary undertones lifted by hints of candy apple.

Brightly sweet, crisply tart. Pink grapefruit, cocoa nib, yellow plum, honey, oak in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy-sweet acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Closes with notes of cocoa nib and yellow plum with fresh oak undertones.

Sweetly citrusy, cocoa-toned, delicately aromatic. Cocoa nib, Meyer lemon, freesia, almond butter, apricot in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Citrusy-sweet finish with undertones of cocoa nib.

Deep-toned, richly sweet-savory. Dark chocolate, boysenberry, almond brittle, sorrel, star jasmine in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; vibrant, syrupy mouthfeel. Harmonious, integrated, long-lasting finish.

Complex, juicy, sweetly tart. Guava, lemongrass, salted caramel, myrrh, galangal in aroma and cup. Delicately high-toned, floral acidity; viscous, syrupy mouthfeel. Very long, confident, coherent finish.

Richly fruity, crisply chocolaty. Dried blueberry, baking chocolate, salted caramel, fresh-cut oak, thyme in aroma and cup. Crisp, gentle acidity; full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with undertones of dried blueberry.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Grape GildVine Natural G1
review: Rich, fruity, deeply chocolaty. Wild blueberry, milk chocolate, gardenia, pink peppercorn, oak in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Milk chocolate and blueberry commingle in the complex, nuanced finish.

Sweetly tart, juicy-bright. Pomegranate, agave syrup, roasted almond, butter cookie, Meyer lemon zest in aroma and cup. Sweetly-tart acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Tart-leaning finish supported by notes of agave syrup and butter cookie.

Rich-toned, sweetly fruity. Dark chocolate, blackberry, salted caramel, rhododendron, tangerine in aroma and cup. Balanced, mild acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. Exceptionally long, chocolaty and fruit-forward finish.
Richly aromatic, deeply floral. Narcissus, blood orange, clove, Concord grape, makrut lime leaf in aroma and cup.

Deep-toned, vibrantly sweet-savory. Gooseberry, rhododendron, dark chocolate, amber, cedar in aroma and cup. Complex, juicy acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. Resonant, flavor-saturated, very long finish.

Sangria. Red Grape. Guava. Red Apple. Richly sweet, crisply sweet-tart. Raspberry, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, wisteria, hint of wine barrel in aroma and cup. Balanced, malic acidity; very full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Tart-leaning, cocoa-toned, multilayered finish.

Vibrantly sweet-savory. Lychee, baking chocolate, pink grapefruit, freesia, amber in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; very full, creamy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and freesia.

Deeply sweet, rich-toned. Dark chocolate, date, lilac, cedar, pomelo in aroma and cup. Balanced, sweet-toned structure with mild acidity; crisp, syrupy mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with undertones of date and cedar.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Natural Sidama Blue Donkey Lot 2
review: Gently fruit-forward, complex, high-toned. Passionfruit, amber, wisteria, cocoa nib, tangerine in aroma and cup. Bright, sparkling acidity; silky-smooth, vibrant mouthfeel. Flavor-saturated, harmonious, very long finish.

coffee_name: Colombia Sebastian Ramirez Washed Pink Bourbon
review: High-toned, lushly floral. Red currant, cocoa nib, wisteria, myrrh, pomelo in aroma and cup. Sparkling, balanced, very juicy acidity; taut, satiny mouthfeel. Long, harmonious, integrated and flavor-saturated finish.

coffee_name: Guatemala Washed Finca El General Gesha
review: Crisply chocolaty, deeply floral. Dark chocolate, narcissus, apricot, almond butter, cedar in aroma and cup. Balanced, malic acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with undertones of narcissus and almond.

coffee_name: Trust the Process Costa Rica Finca Carrizal SL28 Black Diamond Natural
review: Richly sweet, elegantly tart, complex. Pink grapefruit, cocoa nib, strawberry guava, lemongrass, palo santo in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright, balanced acidity; plush, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Long, multilayered, resonant finish that carries all the aroma and flavor notes of the cup into the long.

coffee_name: Guatemala Finca El General Bourbon Honey Espresso
review: Evaluated as espresso. Deep-toned, sweetly tart. Black cherry, dark chocolate, marjoram, pink grapefruit, hazelnut in aroma and small cup. Creamy-smooth mouthfeel; chocolaty, tart-leaning finish. In cappuccino format, richly sweet, brightly tart, deeply chocolaty.

Evaluated as espresso. Crisply sweet, richly savory. Pomegranate, freesia, cocoa powder, lemongrass, honey in aroma and small cup. Satiny-smooth mouthfeel; cocoa-toned, citrusy finish. In cappuccino format, cocoa-driven with undertones of pomegranate and honey.

Evaluated as espresso. Briskly sweet-tart, crisply chocolaty. Date, roasted almond, baking chocolate, pink grapefruit, fresh-cut oak in aroma and small cup. Lightly satiny mouthfeel; tart, wood-framed finish with sweet citrus undertones. In three parts milk, balanced and richly bittersweet, with nice baking chocolate and almond notes in the foreground.

Evaluated as espresso. Richly aromatic, sweetly tart. Lychee, pomelo, dark chocolate, cedar, apple blossom in aroma and small cup. Creamy-smooth mouthfeel; fruit-toned, chocolaty finish. As cappuccino, dark chocolate, apple blossom and lychee play nicely with milk.

Sweetly berry-toned, gently fermenty. Raspberry coulis, wine barrel, dark chocolate, clove, gardenia in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish revolves around notes of raspberry and wine barrel.

Evaluated as espresso produced as a “ristretto” 25ml (.85-ounce) shot using a Nespresso capsule espresso brewer with whole milk heated using a conventional steam wand. Briskly sweet, gently wood-framed. Baking chocolate, almond, fir, golden raisin, marjoram in aroma and small cup. Light-bodied mouthfeel; sweet-toned, wood-framed finish with undertones of baking chocolate. In cappuccino format, chocolate notes are amplified, and marjoram resurfaces.

Richly sweet, deeply spice-toned. Red currant, sandalwood, star jasmine, dark chocolate, hint of ginger in aroma and cup. Balanced, gently bright acidity; very full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Red currant and sandalwood notes harmonize in the finish, with undertones of star jasmine, dark chocolate and ginger.

Floral-toned, sweetly tart. Magnolia, vanilla bean, pistachio, cocoa nib, agave syrup in aroma and cup. High-toned, balanced acidity; crisp, very satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of cocoa nib and magnolia.

Richly floral-toned, sweetly citrusy. Wisteria, magrut lime leaf, cocoa butter, pink grapefruit, graphite in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright, balanced acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Long, harmonious, integrated, satisfying finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Bench-Maji Lucy Geisha Anaerobic Natural
review: Perfumy, sweetly tart, rich-toned. Loquat, cocoa butter, magnolia, neroli, sugarcane in aroma and cup. Crisp, citrusy acidity; very syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Sweet, long, fruit-forward finish.
Sweet, ketoney. Tequila barrel, vanilla, fir pulp, simple syrup, green peppercorn in aroma and cup. Brash acidity; chalky mouthfeel. Wood-framed finish with distinct ketone notes.

Delicately fruity, deeply sweet. Dried mulberry, almond nougat, freesia, amber, pink grapefruit in aroma and cup. Brisk, winy acidity; full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Exceptionally long, fruit-forward, richly floral finish.

Tropical, richly aromatic, sweetly tart. Guava, pineapple, passionfruit, cocoa nib, Thai basil in aroma and cup. Balanced, juicy-bright acidity; very viscous, silky mouthfeel. Resonant, satisfying, especially long finish.

Floral, citrusy, sweetly herbaceous. Ginger blossom, tangerine, lemon verbena, coca nib, amber in aroma and cup. Bright, phosphoric acidity; vibrant, silky mouthfeel. Harmonious, integrated, flavor-laden, very long finish.
Very sweet, deeply savory. Ripe tomato, narcissus, cedar, red currant, almond butter in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, flavor-saturated finish.

Chocolaty-sweet, fruit-forward. Baking chocolate, red grape, pink peppercorn, freesia, oak in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with undertones of pink peppercorn.

Deeply sweet, richly savory. Salted caramel, pomegranate, myrrh, hazelnut, cedar in aroma and cup. Balanced, briskly sweet acidity; very ful, satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of salted caramel and pomegranate with cedar undertones.

Gently fruit-toned, sweetly herbaceous. Pineapple, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, narcissus, honey in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Finish leads with notes of lemon verbena and narcissus.

Rich-toned, deeply sweet-savory. Red currant, ripe tomato, dark chocolate, magnolia, tangerine in aroma and cup. Juicy, high-toned acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, harmonious, long, flavor-saturated finish.

Floral-toned, brightly sweet. Jasmine, apricot, cocoa nib, almond butter lemongrass in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of apricot and almond.
Sweet, complex, deep-toned. Cocoa nib, red apple, walnut butter, candied violet, cedar in aroma and cup. Gently bright acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Very long, lingering, flavor-saturated finish.

Chocolaty, berry-driven. Dark chocolate, mulberry, agave syrup, tangerine, amber in aroma and cup. Gently brisk acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Crisply chocolaty finish with undertones of mulberry.

Floral-toned, crisply chocolaty. Honeysuckle, baking chocolate, sugarcane, apricot, almond butter in aroma and cup. Gently bright acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Floral-toned finish supported by notes of almond and baking chocolate.

Richly sweet, fruit-forward. Black cherry, chocolate fudge, hazelnut, gardenia, whiskey barrel in aroma and cup. Gently bright, malic acidity; plush, syrupy, vibrant mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with undertones of hazelnut and whiskey barrel.

coffee_name: Guatemala Santa Ana Dilla Alghe Washed
review: Richly sweet, deep-toned. Caramel apple, baking chocolate, pink grapefruit, almond, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; lightly syruoy, vibrant mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and almond with cedar undertones.

coffee_name: Panama Renaissance Series Flora Geisha Washed
review: Floral-toned, sweetly herbaceous. Narcissus, rosemary, cocoa nib, amber, honey in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; Delicate, silky-smooth mouthfeel. Very long, resonant, flavor-laden finish.

Gently tart, chocolaty. Lemon balm, cocoa powder, date, cedar sassafras in aroma and cup. Bright, winy acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Gently drying finish consolidates to notes of lemon balm, cedar and cocoa powder.

Bright, sweetly tart. Cocoa nib, pie cherry, bay leaf, tangerine, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Juicy, sweet-tart acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Resonant finish centered around cocoa nib and pink peppercorn notes.

Sweet, richly spice-toned. Cinnamon, clove, baking chocolate, fig bar, amber in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and cinnamon.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Coffee Lamp Series Worka Natural G1
review: Crisply sweet, berry-toned. Blueberry, almond, baking chocolate, lime zest, nutmeg in aroma and cup. Sweet-toned structure with delicate acidity; full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Almond notes carry the finish, supported by baking chocolate and lime zest.

coffee_name: Guatemala La Minita La Flor Peaberry Washed
review: Sweet-toned, richly nutty. Candied walnut, baking chocolate, orange zest, sugarcane, tea rose in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Nut-toned finish with undertones of orange zest and baking chocolate.

Bright, sweet, citrusy. Sweet lime, almond, marjoram, cocoa nib, fresh-cut oak, violet in aroma and cup. Sweet-toned, balanced acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Citrusy finish with undertones of almond and oak.

Bright, sweetly tart. Pomegranate, lemon verbena, cocoa nib, freesia, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-tart acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Gently drying cocoa-toned finish supported by notes of lemon verbena and cedar.

Richly chocolaty, floral-toned. Dark chocolate, gardenia, hazelnut, tangerine zest, mesquite in aroma and cup. Sweet, round, gentle acidity; plush, very syrupy mouthfeel. Crisply chocolaty finish with undertones of gardenia and tangerine zest.

Richly sweet-savory. Red currant, baking chocolate, pink grapefruit zest, freesia, hint of amber in aroma and cup. Sweet-toned, malic (apple-like) acidity; silky-smooth mouthfeel. Harmonious, integrated finish.

Cocoa-toned, sweet-tart. Cocoa powder, Brazil nut, lemon balm, fir, dried fig in aroma and cup. Sweet, slightly astringent acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. Harmonious finish consolidates to notes of cocoa powder and lemon balm.

Tart-leaning, citrusy. Meyer lemon, pie cherry, baking chocolate, cashew, sassafras in aroma and cup. Tart, citrusy acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Gently drying, citrus finish with undertones of sweet pine bark.
Delicately sweet-tart, gently floral. Lilac, red plum, raw almond, baking chocolate, grapefruit in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Crisply chocolaty, nut-toned finish.

Sweetly smoky, citrusy. Gently scorched Meyer lemon zest, mesquite, dark chocolate, lily, hazelnut in aroma and cup. Low-toned, jagged acidity; tannic, lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Smoky-citrusy wood-framed finish.

Rich-toned, earthy-sweet. Fresh humus, cocoa powder, gently scorched sandalwood, gardenia, graphite in aroma and cup. Gentle, almost imperceptible acidity; dry vermouth-like mouthfeel. Earthy sweet finish with hints of cocoa powder underneath.

Crisply sweet, delicately tart. Cocoa nib, orange zest, bay leaf, yellow plum, cedar in aroma and cup. Brisk, balanced acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Gently drying, citrusy and cocoa-toned finish.

Roast-muted, wood-framed. Earthy, sweetly savory. Treacle, fresh-turned soil, scorched fir, lily, date in aroma and cup. Sharp, astringent acidity; bitter but viscous mouthfeel. Smoky, woody finish with undertones of lily.
Harsh, bitter. Charcoal, snap pea, soapy florals, carob, stale raising in aroma and cup. Harsh, bitter acidity; droopy mouthfeel. Woody, burnt finish.

coffee_name: Colombia San Martin Bourbon Aji Star Fruit Peach Honey
review: Richly sweet-savory. Kiwi, cinnamon, white tea, gardenia, dill in aroma and cup. Tangy, juicy acidity; vibrant, silky-smooth acidity. Long-lasting, harmonious, flavor-laden and richly aromatic finish.

coffee_name: Taiwan COE #3 Alishan Zhou Zhu Yuan Geisha Natural
review: Crisply sweet, richly nutty. Cantaloupe, pistachio, satsuma mandarin, elm, amber in aroma and cup. Balanced, bright acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of elm and pistachio.

Evaluated as espresso. Bright, juicy-tart, floral-toned. Honeysuckle, finger lime, myrrh, dark chocolate, jujube in aroma and small cup. Vibrant, crisp, smooth mouthfeel; richly tart, satiating finish. In cappuccino format, balanced, chocolaty, sweetly tart, floral-toned.

coffee_name: Taiwan COE#9 Alishan Zhuo Wu Farm Geisha Honey
review: Crisply sweet-tart, gently spice-toned. Cranberry, pink peppercorn, cashew butter, pine, freesia in aroma and cup. Tart-leaning, citric acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. Wood-framed finish with cashew undertones.

coffee_name: Las Margaritas Colombia Sudan Rume Natural
review: Richly fruit-driven, sweetly herbaceous. Caramelized pineapple, pistachio, satsuma mandarin, sage, raw cacao in aroma and cup. High-toned, malic acidity; lively, lightly syrupy, very smooth mouthfeel. Harmonious, deeply aromatic, flavor-laden finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Uraga Raro Washed G1
review: Bright, vibrant, sweetly tart. Apricot, pink grapefruit, jasmine, cedar, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. High-toned, juicy acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. The crisp, long finish leads with notes of apricot and pink grapefruit with undertones of cocoa nib.

coffee_name: Kenya Kirinyaga Karimikui Factory AA TOP Washed
review: Balanced, sweetly savory. Cocoa nib, bay leaf, mulberry, dark caramel, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Brightly sweet, malic acidity; crisp, syrupy mouthfeel. Long, flavor-saturated finish centered around notes of cocoa nib and pink peppercorn.

Richly berry-toned, sweetly tart. Berry melange, cocoa nib, rhododendron, cashew, tangerine in aroma and cup. Crisp, balanced acidity; plush, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Berry-driven finish supported by notes of cashew and cocoa nib.
Crisp, deep, sweetly spice-toned. Blackberry, dark chocolate, clove, lemon verbena, cedar in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. Long, resonant, flavor-saturated finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Yirgacheffe Misty Valley Aricha Washed G1
review: Complex, intricate, richly sweet. Star jasmine, cocoa nib, white peach, frankincense, lavender in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Resonant, flavor-saturated finish that centers notes of star jasmine and white peach, grounded by crisp cocoa nib.

Fruit-toned, sweetly nutty. Blueberry, almond butter, baking chocolate, magnolia, cedar in aroma and cup. Sweet-toned structure with gentle, round acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. Resonant finish centers around notes of blueberry and baking chocolate with undertones of cedar.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Uraga Tabe Burka G1 Washed
review: Richly aromatic, sweetly savory. Plum, dark chocolate, cedar, sarsaparilla, apple blossom in aroma and cup. Sweetly brisk acidity; full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish  consolidates to notes of plum, dark chocolate and cedar.

Richly sweet, deeply savory. Dried peach, walnut, sugarcane, rhododendron, baking chocolate in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of dried peach and walnut.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Hambela Red Honey G1
review: Sweetly nut-toned, richly bittersweet. Hazelnut toffee, lemon verbena, pear, baking chocolate, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of cedar and hazelnut toffee.

Sweet-toned, nutty. Cashew butter, agave syrup, orange zest, fresh-cut fir, dried fig in aroma and cup. Balanced, gently bright acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Crisp, bittersweet finish with notes of orange zest and agave syrup supported by fir.

Crisply chocolaty, sweetly nut-toned. Baking chocolate, almond brittle, red apple, cedar, marjoram in aroma and cup. Sweetly brisk acidity; full, velvety mouthfeel. Nut-toned, crisply chocolaty finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama Bensa Alo Single Variety 74158 Natural
review: Intensely aromatic, sweetly fermenty. Blueberry jam, Cognac, cocoa nib, pistachio spearmint in aroma and cup. Tart-juicy acidity; fluffy-smooth mouthfeel. Quietly sweet finish with notes of blueberry and Cognac.

Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly tart, dusky. Black cherry, frangipane, dark chocolate, gently scorched mesquite, artichoke blossom in aroma and small cup. Fluffy mouthfeel; crisp, chocolaty finish with undertones of sweetly smoky mesquite. In cappuccino format, complex, rich-toned, chocolaty and sweet, with black cherry and frangipane notes into the long finish.

Crisply chocolaty, sweetly nut-toned. Baking chocolate, cashew butter, date, freesia, green apple in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; very full, satiny mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with undertones of freesia.

coffee_name: El Salvador Loma La Gloria Unicorn Natural
review: Juicy-bright, complex, rich-toned. Pomelo, magnolia, cocoa nib, raspberry jam, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, long, satiating finish.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Las Lajas SL-28 Natural
review: Invitingly fruit-toned, chocolaty. Dried mango, bergamot, almond butter, dark chocolate, cedar in aroma and cup. Sweet, brisk acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Exceptionally long, resonant, flavor-laden finish.

Balanced, crisply sweet, richly aromatic. Dark caramel, cashew butter, gardenia, red apple, pink grapefruit in aroma and cup. Mild, sweet-toned acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Sweetly nut-toned finish supported by pink grapefruit and gardenia.

Richly sweet-tart, chocolaty and floral. Dried mulberry, dark chocolate, finger lime, amber, bay leaf in aroma and cup. Winy acidity; very syrupy, viscous mouthfeel. Finish centers around notes of dried mulberry and dark chocolate.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Bishala G1 Red Honey
review: Richly sweet-tart, complex, fruit-forward. Raspberry, cocoa nib, honeysuckle, myrrh, nougat in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet, gently tart acidity; richly syrupy mouthfeel. Resonant finish consolidates to raspberry and cocoa nib.

Richly sweet-savory, sweetly herbaceous. Red currant, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, pink grapefruit, sugarcane in aroma and cup. Energetic, sparkling acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Cocoa-driven finish with undertones of red currant and lemon verbena.

Crisply sweet, cocoa-toned. Cocoa nib, maple syrup, Meyer lemon, snickerdoodle, oak in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; full, lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of cocoa nib and snickerdoodle.

coffee_name: Honduras Comsa Station Natural SHG EP
review: Evaluated as espresso. Crisply chocolaty, deep-toned. Baking chocolate, caramel, lemon balm, dried plum, fresh-cut fir in aroma and small cup. Crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel; gently drying, wood-framed finish. In cappuccino format, chocolate  and dried plum notes shine.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama Bensa Shantawene Gatta Kenean Dukamo Anaerobic Natural G1
review: Floral, citrusy, richly sweet. Honeysuckle, blood orange, wild honey, lemon verbena, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart structure with high-toned, juicy acidity; full, lively, smooth mouthfeel. Crisp finish centers around notes of honeysuckle, blood orange and wild honey.

Richly floral-toned, balanced. Narcissus, lavender, rice candy, cocoa nib, tangerine in aroma and cup. Gently bright, citrusy acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned, predominantly floral finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Natural Guji Shakiso Anasora G1
review: Richly aromatic, deeply sweet-tart. Black cherry, honeysuckle, cashew butter, baking chocolate, sugar cane in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart structure with winy acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of cashew butter and baking chocolate with hints of black cherry.

coffee_name: Colombia Huila La Florida Natural Selective
review: Richly sweet-tart, fruit-driven. Pomegranate, dark chocolate, toffee, magnolia, cedar in aroma and cup. Tart-leaning structure with vibrant, juicy acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of pomegranate and magnolia with dark chocolate undertones.

Crisply sweet-savory, gently herbaceous. Baking chocolate, hop flowers, lemon balm, spearmint, red apple in aroma and cup. Gently bright, balanced acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, long, flavor-saturated finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidamo Arbegona OLOROSO Station 74158 TOP GRADE 1 Yellow Honey
review: Richly sweet, with complex aromatics. Dried apricot, dark chocolate, lilac, pink grapefruit, amber in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart structure with brisk acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Delicate finish leads with chocolate and apricot notes supported by amber.

Complex, multi-layered, deeply sweet-savory. Myrrh, cocoa powder, black currant, magnolia, sage in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; delicate, lithe, silky mouthfeel. Richly aromatic, satisfying finish that fulfills the promise of the cup.

Crisply chocolaty, berry-toned. Dried strawberry, baking chocolate, daisy, cedar, orange zest in aroma and cup. Crisply sweet acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with undertones of orange zest and cedar.
Elegantly fruit-toned, sweetly citrusy. Raspberry coulis, dark chocolate, tangerine, gardenia, cedar in aroma and cup. High-toned acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Berry-driven, chocolaty finish.

Cocoa-toned, richly sweet. Red plum, cocoa nib, agave syrup, freesia, cedar in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. Resonant finish consolidates to notes of cocoa nib and red plum.
Sweetly tart, spice-toned. Cocoa nib, Meyer lemon, clove, wild honey, amber in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet, gently tart acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Long, lingering, resonant integrated finish.

Richly floral, crisply fruity. Narcissus, boysenberry, brown sugar, cocoa powder, oak in aroma and cup. Sweet-savory structure with brisk acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. Very long, flavor-laden finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Oromia Guji Uraga Kurume TOP GRADE 1 Anaerobic Natural
review: Crisp, sweet-toned. Caramel, teriyaki sauce, orange zest, raisin, fir in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-savory acidity; full, viscous mouthfeel. Gently drying, wood-framed finish.
Gently fruit-toned, complex. Strawberry, pistachio, hop flowers, Meyer lemon, basil in aroma and cup. Gentle, mild acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Fruity, sweetly herbaceous finish.

Deep-toned, chocolaty and roast-rounded. Chocolate fudge, maraschino cherry, cashew, gently scorched cedar, marjoram in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of chocolate fudge, scorched cedar and cashew.

Evaluated as espresso. Crisply chocolaty, gently floral. Baking chocolate, freesia, almond, satsuma, fresh-cut oak in aroma and small cup. Syrupy-smooth mouthfeel; chocolaty, nutty finish. In cappuccino format, balanced and inviting.

Bright, sweet, richly floral-toned. Frangipane, ginger blossom, blood orange zest, saffron, hazelnut butter in aroma and cup. Floral-toned, juicy-bright acidity; lightly creamy, very smooth mouthfeel. Richly resonant, elongated finish.

Elegant, floral-toned, sweetly herbaceous. Narcissus, agave syrup, dried apricot, marjoram, salted almond in aroma and cup. Delicately bright, gently tart acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Very long, flavor-saturated, harmonious finish.

coffee_name: Panama Geisha Vuelta DRD Natural Lot GN-01
review: Layered, subtle, profoundly sweet. Jujube, allspice, pistachio, candied violet, dragonfruit in aroma and cup. High-toned, malic (apple-like) acidity; delicately silky mouthfeel. Crisp, satisfying, flavor-saturated finish.

Richly aromatic, deeply and complexly sweet. Passionfruit, cocoa nib, pomelo, wild honey, hazelnut butter in aroma and cup. Gently tart with sparkling acidity; lush, silky mouthfeel. Long, resonant, harmonious finish.

Rich-toned, tropical-leaning. Ginger blossom, cocoa nib, bergamot, amber, maple syrup in aroma and cup. Juicy-tart, citrusy acidity; vibrant, silky-smooth mouthfeel. Citrusy-sweet, cocoa-toned finish.

Juicy-bright, tart-leaning. Pomegranate, dried pineapple, dark chocolate, marjoram, cedar in aroma and cup. Malic (apple-like) acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Invitingly long, richly aromatic finish.

Richly sweet, delicately tart. Vanilla orchid, finger lime, cocoa nib, butterscotch, brown sugar in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant finish centered around notes of butterscotch and finger lime.

Rich-toned, balanced, bright. Almond butter, salted caramel, date, freesia, cedar in aroma and cup. Gently bright, sweetly tart acidity; crisp, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Richly nutty finish with undertones of freesia.

Sweetly spice-toned, crisply chocolaty. Clove, Meyer lemon zest, magnolia, baking chocolate, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and clove.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Natural Sidama ALO Village FL
review: Rich-toned, complex, fruit-forward. Dried mango, dark chocolate, macadamia, finger lime, amber in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart structure with bright, vibrant acidity; very syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. The fruit-centered finish is long, layered and lingering.

Bright, sweet, high-toned. Guava, baking chocolate, pink grapefruit, macadamia, coconut in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; vibrant, satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and pink grapefruit.
Elegantly sweet, spice-toned. Bergamot, cocoa nib, star anise, apricot, narcissus in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. Exceptionally long, cohesive, complex finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Washed Uraga More Floral Kurume Espresso
review: Evaluated as espresso. Richly chocolaty, deeply floral. Dark chocolate, wisteria, myrrh, black cherry, cedar in aroma and small cup. Richly viscous mouthfeel; flavor-laden, complex finish. In cappuccino format, chocolate and floral notes vie for your attention, and both win.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Natural Guji Hambella Wamena Buku G1
review: Deeply sweet, gently tart, richly savory. Dried plum, cocoa nib, lemon-thyme, tangerine, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Satiating, flavor-saturated finish.

Rich-toned, fruity, deeply sweet. Raspberry jam, baking chocolate, ginger blossom, fresh-cut fir, maple syrup in aroma and cup. Sweet structure with gentle acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant finish centers on raspberry and chocolate notes supported by spice-toned florals.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Gesha Village Surma 1931 Mossto Anaerobic Honey
review: Fruit-forward, gently spice-toned, floral. Cantaloupe, narcissus, nutmeg, cocoa nib, amber in aroma and cup. Juicy, balanced acidity; vibrantly silky, very smooth mouthfeel. Long, lingering, fruity and floral finish.

Crisply sweet-tart, high-toned. Jasmine, hazelnut, cocoa nib, tangerine, lychee in aroma and cup. Bright, citric acidity; smooth, silky mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by notes of jasmine and tangerine.

Complex, richly aromatic, spice-toned. Candied violet, clove, dried red plum, cocoa nib, frankincense in aroma and cup. Balanced, malic (apple-like) acidity; vibrant, very silky-smooth mouthfeel. Layered, long-lasting finish.

Earthy-sweet, richly nutty. Cashew butter, fresh humus, dark chocolate, golden raisin, fir in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-savory acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Nutty finish supported by dark chocolate tones.

Deeply sweet-savory, rich-toned. Dark chocolate, date, fresh-cut fir, cashew butter, gardenia in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; very full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Gently drying finish centered around dark chocolate and fresh-cut fir.

Complex, deep-toned, richly sweet. Black cherry, aromatic orchid, cocoa nib, amber, wild honey in aroma and cup. Juicy, sparkling acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Resonant, coherent, very long finish that fulfills the promise of the cup.

coffee_name: Some Serious Gourmet Sh*t Sumatra Mandheling Natural
review: Bright, balanced, juicy. Sweet-tarts candy, cocoa powder, freesia, sugarcane, cedar in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart, malic (apple-like) acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Delicately sweet, gently tart finish.

High-toned, delicately aromatic. Bergamot, star jasmine, Meyer lemon zest, cocoa nib, myrrh in aroma and cup. Bright, sparkling acidity; very smooth, live, silky mouthfeel. Very long, flavor-saturated finish that honors the promise of the cup.

Evaluated as espresso. Richly sweet-tart, crisply chocolaty. Raspberry, baking chocolate, brown sugar, orange zest, fresh-cut oak in aroma and small cup. Velvety-smooth mouthfeel; quiet, chocolaty finish with undertones of orange zest. In cappuccino format, raspberry and baking chocolate notes are pleasingly amplified.

Evaluated as espresso. Richly nut-toned, crisply chocolaty. Hazelnut butter, dark chocolate, vanilla bean, date, cedar in aroma and small cup. Crisp, satiny mouthfeel; cedary, vanilla-toned finish. In cappuccino format, deeply sweet, richly nutty, balanced.

Evaluated as espresso. Deep-toned, crisply chocolaty. Cocoa powder, nutmeg, golden raisin, fresh-cut fir, orange zest in aroma and small cup. Crisp, velvety mouthfeel; chocolaty, spice-toned finish. In cappuccino format, richly chocolaty with undertones of nutmeg, fir and orange zest.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama Bensa Hamasho Washed G1 74158
review: High-toned, crisply sweet. Apricot, almond, tangerine, cocoa nib, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Gently bright, citrusy acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by tangerine and lemon verbena.

Complex, fruit-driven, vibrant. Passionfruit, cocoa butter, rose hips, lavender, blood orange in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy, phosphoric acidity; very syrupy mouthfeel. Richly aromatic, nuanced finish consolidates to notes of cocoa butter and lavender.
Delicately fruity, crisply chocolaty. Goji berry, baking chocolate, hazelnut, lime zest, fresh-cut fir in aroma and cup. Sweetly brisk acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Nutty, chocolaty finish.

Crisply sweet-savory, rich-toned. Baking chocolate, red plum, almond, apple blossom, salted caramel in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with undertones of almond and salted caramel.

Deeply savory, sweetly tart. Jolly Rancher, hop flowers, halvah, pineapple kefir, hint of sweet soy in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-savory acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Savory-leaning finish redolent of halvah and sweet soy.

Evaluated as espresso. Richly chocolaty, sweetly nut-toned. Pomegranate, chocolate fudge, butterscotch, almond, marjoram in aroma and small cup. Creamy, viscous mouthfeel; chocolaty, richly nutty finish. As a cappuccino, exceptionally chocolaty and very rich.

Evaluated as espresso. Delicately aromatic, floral-toned. Freesia, dark chocolate, hazelnut butter, lychee, cedar in aroma and small cup. Syrupy-smooth mouthfeel; crisp, chocolaty finish. In cappuccino format, richly floral, crisply chocolaty and sweetly nutty.

Evaluated as espresso. Gently bright, balanced. Hazelnut, cocoa nib, goji berry, candied violet, oak in aroma and cup. Plush, satiny mouthfeel; quiet, nutty and cocoa-toned finish. As cappuccino, richly nut-toned with sweet floral impulses.

Evaluated as espresso. Richly sweet, gently roast-rounded. Baking chocolate, Fig Newton, gently scorched cedar, gardenia, orange zest in aroma and small cup. Crisp, velvety mouthfeel; chocolaty finish with undertones of gently scorched cedar. In milk, complex and invitingly nuanced with notes of aking chocolate, orange zest, and gardenia.

Rich-toned, balanced and deep. Dark chocolate, nutmeg, almond butter, tangerine, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Chocolaty, spice-toned finish, resonant and long.

Richly sweet, candylike. Candied violet, dried red plum, cocoa nib, marjoram, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; very full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by notes of candied violet and marjoram.

Floral-toned, deeply fruity. Narcissus, mangosteen, lychee, bergamot, almond butter in aroma and cup. High-toned, malic (apple-like) acidity; crisp, stainy mouthfeel. Exceptionally long, harmonious, resonant finish.

Complex, elegant, lush. Oolong tea, pistachio, jujube, freesia, allspice in aroma and cup. Juicy-tart-savory structure with sparkling acidity; very full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. A wild honey note surfaces in the finish, supporting freesia, jujube and allspice.

Elegant, high-toned, sweetly tart. Apricot nectar, almond butter, cocoa nib, bergamot, amber, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Juicy, citrusy acidity; vibrant, silky-smooth mouthfeel. Long, resonantly sweet, invigoratingly tart finish that fulfills the promise of the cup.

Balanced, quietly confident. Pink grapefruit, amber, apricot, green peppercorn, maple syrup in aroma and cup. Gently bright, juicy acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Sweetly citrusy finish with a green peppercorn-like spice note.

Gently fruit-toned, richly floral. Yellow plum, agave syrup, plumeria, nutmeg, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Crisp citrusy acidity; A clean,plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Resonant finish consolidates to cocoa nib and nutmeg, with undercurrents of plumeria.

Delicately pungent, sweetly tart. Rose hips, dried raspberry, cocoa nib, finger lime, marjoram in aroma and cup. Gently bright, balanced acidity; vibrant, sparkling acidity. Crisply tart, berry-toned finish supported by notes of cocoa nib and marjoram.

Fruit-centered, richly chocolaty. Berry melange, chocolate fudge, pink peppercorn, lemon balm, candied violet in aroma and cup. in aroma and cup. Tart, winey acidity; very full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, long, flavor-saturated finish.

Exceptionally aromatic, complex, deeply floral. White rose, mango lassi, almond butter, pink grapefruit, amber in aroma and cup. Intensely sweet structure with
juicy, layered acidity; viscous, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. High-toned, floral, very long finish.

Intensely sweet, gently tart. Dark caramel, dried plum, lavender, cantaloupe, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Finish centers around notes of dark caramel and lavender.

Sweet-toned, crisply chocolaty. Bing cherry, hazelnut, baking chocolate, toffee, pink grapefruit zest in aroma and cup. Balanced, vibrant acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Chocolaty, sweetly nutty finish with undertones of pink grapefruit zest.

coffee_name: Guatemala Maravilla La Cumbre Washed Pache
review: Deeply, chocolaty, sweet and rich. Dark chocolate, hazelnut, brown sugar, tiger lily, lemon balm in aroma and cup. Gentle, sweet-toned acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Chocolaty, sweetly nutty finish.

coffee_name: El Salvador Finca Santa Sofia Natural Kenya
review: Complex, crisply sweet-savory. Sesame seed, dried mulberry, amber, cocoa nib, cedar in aroma and cup. Brightly sweet, gently tart acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. Very long, flavor-saturated, deep-toned finish.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Hacienda Sonora Natural Milenio
review: Fruit-forward, chocolaty, sweetly herbaceous. Cheerwine cola, pomegranate, bay leaf, almond, dark chocolate in aroma and cup. Bight, juicy-sweet acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant finish consolidates to notes of Cheerwine cola and bay leaf with dark chocolate undertones.

Crisply sweet-savory. Hop flowers, date, marjoram, satsuma mandarin, salted caramel in aroma and cup. Gently brisk, bittersweet acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Crisp, sweet-savory finish centered around notes of hop flowers and salted caramel.

Gently fruit-forward, cocoa-toned. Cocoa nib, watermelon, lychee, macadamia nut, wild honey in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy, balanced acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Very long, sweet and deep-toned finish, harmoniously integrating all the aromas and flavors of the cup.

Bright, juicy, floral-toned. Lemon blossom, myrrh, sage honey, almond, white peppercorn in aroma and cup. Rich, high-toned acidity; silky, vibrant mouthfeel. Sage honey and myrrh carry the rich-toned finish.

High-toned, sweet-tart, cocoa-toned. Cocoa nib, pomegranate, magnolia, lemon verbena, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart structure with brisk acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. The finish consolidates to notes of cocoa nib with undertones of magnolia and lemon verbena.

Richly sweet, deeply nut-toned. Hazelnut, apricot, tangerine, cedar, jasmine in aroma and cup. Crisp, malic (apple-like) acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Floral-toned finish supported by rich hazelnut notes.

Sweetly tart, rich-toned. Tamarind, dark chocolate, wine barrel, magnolia, nutmeg in aroma and cup. Crisply sweet, winey acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Long, resonant, flavor-laden finish that fulfills the promise of the cup.

coffee_name: Espresso Np. 7 Fincas Las Moritas Pacamaras
review: Evaluated as espresso. Chocolaty-sweet, deep-toned. Chocolate fudge, salted caramel, hop flowers, dried plum, tangerine in aroma and cup. Crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Richly chocolaty finish supported by hop flowers. In cappuccino format, chocolate notes predominate, with undertones of savory caramel and bitter sweet florals.

coffee_name: El Salvador Finca Plan de Hoyo
review: Elegant, cocoa-toned, gently citrusy. Cocoa nib, tangerine, pink peppercorn, agave syrup, bay leaf in aroma and cup. Malic (apple-like acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned, citrusy finish.

Richly nut-toned floral. Pistachio, honeysuckle, red apple, cedar, pink grapefruit zest in aroma and cup. Bright, sparkling acidity; satiny mouthfeel. Pistachio and honeysuckle carry the resonant finish, with hints of pink grapefruit zest underneath.

High-toned, crisply sweet-tart. Tamarind, cashew butter, Meyer lemon zest, cedar in aroma and cup. Bright, vibrant acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Finish leads with notes of tamarind and cashew butter.

Sweetly roasty, spice-toned. Dark chocolate, date, clove, scorched oak, gardenia in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. The finish leads with notes of date and scorched oak.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Rivense Finca El Mango Honey Process
review: Berry-toned, elegantly sweet-tart. Berry melange, fresh cream, lemon verbena, Nutella, cedar in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright, balanced acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Crisply chocolaty, sweetly herbaceous finish.

Crisply sweet, nut-toned. Cashew brittle, pie cherry, carnation, baking chocolate, mesquite in aroma and cup. Sweet-toned with brisk acidity; very syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish is characterized by notes of baking chocolate, carnation and mesquite.

Richly sweet-savory. Baking chocolate, yellow golden raisin, nougat, cedar, freesia in aroma and cup. Brisk acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. The wood-framed finish has a hint of a crisp chocolate undertones.

Crisply chocolaty, richly bittersweet. Baking chocolate, mustard seed, yellow plum, fir, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Bittersweet structure with brisk acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Gently drying finish centers around notes of baking chocolate and mustard seed with undertones of fir.

Richly fruity, crisply chocolaty. Blackberry jam, baking chocolate, fresh-cut fir, molasses, orange zest in aroma and cup. Gentle, sweet-toned acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish supported by notes of molasses and fir.

Delicately sweet-tart, fruit-forward. Jolly Rancher, Meyer lemon, spearmint, sugarcane, rose hips in aroma and cup. Gently brisk, sweet-toned acidity; very full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Crisp, fruity finish, sweet and citrusy.

Multi-layered, richly sweet-tart. Pomegranate, hibiscus tea, lemon balm, cocoa nib, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-tart acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. Very sweet, candy-like finish with undertones of rich cedar.

Evaluated as espresso. Deeply chocolaty, sweetly nut-toned. Dark chocolate, roasted hazelnut, lemon curd, balsa wood, molasses in aroma and small cup. Creamy-smooth mouthfeel; crisp, chocolaty, nutty finish. In cappuccino format, balanced, deep-toned, richly sweet.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Los Santos Hacienda La Minita
review: Richly cocoa-toned, deeply sweet. Cocoa nib, Bing cherry, almond butter, narcissus, cedar in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; silky-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty, cherry-toned finish.

Richly sweet-savory, deep-toned. Red currant, hop flowers, sage, wild honey, oak in aroma and cup. Gently bright, confident acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Red currant and wild honey notes are supported by oak in the resonant finish.

High-toned, sweetly tart. Watermelon candy, blueberry, jasmine, almond, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Tart-leaning, crisp acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Fruity-sweet finish with undertones of jasmine and cocoa nib.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji First Passion Natural G1
review: Richly sweet, delicately tart. Pomegranate, agave syrup, cocoa nib, marjoram, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet, gentle acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Crisp, sweetly tart finish with undertones of cocoa nib.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama Blossom Peak Washed G1
review: Juicy-bright, rich-toned. Nectarine, narcissus, baking chocolate, oak, almond in aroma and cup. High-toned, balanced acidity; crisp, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Cocoa-driven, floral-toned finish.

Richly sweet, engagingly tart. Pie cherry, dark chocolate, agave syrup, pineapple kefir, fresh-cut fir, bay leaf in aroma and cup. Gently brisk acidity; very full, creamy mouthfeel. Resonantly tart finish with chocolate and fir undertones.

Sweetly tart, high-toned. Caramel apple, baking chocolate, caraway seed, praline, fresh-cut oak in aroma and cup. Crisp, citrusy acidity; full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Quiet finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and caraway seed.

Tangy, sweet-savory, berry-toned. Raspberry candy, baking chocolate, lemon zest, fir, sarsaparilla in aroma and cup. Sweet-savory structure with brisk acidity; very full, creamy mouthfeel. Very long, lingering finish, crisply chocolaty and berry-driven.

Gently fruit-driven, crisply chocolaty. Dried cranberry, gardenia, bay leaf, cashew, baking chocolate in aroma and cup. Sweet-savory structure with brisk acidity; crisp, lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The quiet finish leads with notes of dried cranberry and baking chocolate.

Chocolaty, crisply sweet. Baking chocolate, almond, date, orange zest, rose hips in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; full, velvety mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish supported by notes of orange zest and almond.

Floral-driven, with complex fruit notes. Passionfruit, calamansi, gardenia, salted caramel, blood orange in aroma and cup. Sweet, bright, juicy acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. The resonant finish is carried by notes of passionfruit and gardenia into the long.

Berry-driven, crisply chocolaty. Dried raspberry, cedar, pink grapefruit zest, baking chocolate, marjoram in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. The chocolaty finish has undertones of cedar and pink grapefruit zest.

Richly sweet-savory. Black currant, narcissus, tamarind, cedar, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Complex, bittersweet structure with high-toned acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Sweetly tart finish leads with tamarind notes, supported by narcissus and cedar.

Multi-layered, deeply sweet-tart. Dried cranberry, hibiscus tea, lemon verbena, cocoa nib, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Very sweet, fruit-toned finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama Bensa Hamasho Washed TOH#2
review: Richly sweet, deeply aromatic. Magnolia, dried pear, cocoa nib, lemon balm, ginger candy. Juicy-bright acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish with notes of ginger candy and magnolia.
Sweetly tart, fruity and chocolaty. Pomegranate, dark chocolate, tangerine, pink peppercorn, amber in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; gentle, silky mouthfeel. Chocolaty, fruit-toned finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama Arbegona Natural ASD TOH#2
review: Fruit-forward, crisply chocolaty. Rambutan, cocoa nib, gardenia, fir, macadamia nut in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart structure with brisk acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Sweetly wood-framed finish with undertones of gardenia.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Red Java Honey Finca Los Pinitos
review: Richly sweet, deep-toned. Dried mulberry, pink grapefruit zest, wild honey, freesia, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and cup. Malic (apple-like) acidity; very full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Long, flavor-saturated, complex and inviting finish.

Delicately fruit-toned, sweetly herbaceous. Dried raspberry, tarragon, cocoa nib, tangerine, cedar in aroma and cup. Crisply sweet-tart acidity; full, viscous mouthfeel. Resonant long finish that carries over all the aroma and flavor notes from the cup.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Finca El Cañal Double Diamond
review: Delicately sweet-tart, complex, nuanced. Raspberry coulis, dark chocolate, bergamot, star jasmine, hint of oak wine barrel in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Fruit-forward, chocolaty finish.

Complex, multi-layered. Candied violet, satsuma mandarin, almond, dark chocolate, oak in aroma and cup. Malic (apple-like) acidity; very full, satiny mouthfeel. Sweetly tart finish centered around notes of citrus and candied violet.

Richly sweet, nut toned. Macadamia butter, baking chocolate, pineapple, agave syrup, cedar in aroma and cup. Gently brisk acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Crisp, long, resonant finish centered around notes of baking chocolate and macadamia nut.

Richly sweet-tart, citrusy and bright. Blood orange, baking chocolate, agave syrup, freesia, cedar in aroma and cup. Brisk, tart-leaning acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The long finish leads with notes of baking chocolate and blood orange.

Sweet-toned, crisp and gently bright. Pomelo, apple blossom, cocoa nib, fir, sassafras in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of sassafras and fir.

Richly sweet, crisply chocolaty. Cocoa powder, Brazil nut, date, molasses, hint of gardenia in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by molasses and Brazil nut.

Chocolaty-sweet, gently fruit-forward. Dark chocolate, watermelon candy, cashew, pink grapefruit zest, fresh-cut oak in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of dark chocolate and pink grapefruit zest.

Richly sweet-savory, deep-toned. Red currant, ripe tomato, dark chocolate, cedar, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Lively, balanced acidity; plush, crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Long, resonant, flavor-saturated, harmonious finish.

Crisply sweet, quietly tart. Pear, plumeria, cocoa nib, cedar, hint of amber in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; very smooth, satiny mouthfeel. Quite sweet finish with notes of pear and plumeria.

coffee_name: Colombia Monteblanco Nectar Citrullus Secret Stash
review: Exceptionally sweet, gently tart. Passionfruit, honeydew melon, baking chocolate, bergamot, myrrh in aroma and cup. Crisp, mild acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Long, resonant, lingering, complex finish.

coffee_name: Costa Rica La Casilla Secret Stash
review: Richly sweet, deep-toned. Agave syrup, guava, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, cedar in aroma and cup. Gently citrusy acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. The cocoa-driven finish has undertones of lemon verbena and agave.

Delicate, richly aromatic. Star jasmine, cocoa nib, bergamot, spearmint, frankincense in aroma and cup. Sparkling, juicy acidity; full syrupy mouthfeel. Sweetly herbaceous finish with undertones of cocoa nib and bergamot.

coffee_name: Costa Rica La Laguna Lot Secret Stash
review: Chocolaty-rich, deeply fruit-forward. Wild raspberry, milk chocolate, freesia, pink peppercorn, oak in aroma and cup. Vibrant, sparkling acidity; very full, satiny mouthfeel. Milk chocolate and raspberry commingle in the finish.

Delicately sweet-tart, balanced. Strawberry, macadamia nut, lemon verbena, dark chocolate, oak forest notes in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart structure with high-toned, balanced acidity; crisp, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of cocoa-toned strawberry with sweet herb undertones.

Evaluated as espresso. Deep-toned, richly fruity and chocolaty. Dark chocolate, goji berry, purple plum, pink grapefruit, cedar in aroma and small cup. Plush, creamy mouthfeel; chocolaty, citrusy finish. Everything is amplified in cappuccino format,  especially the dark chocolate and purple plum notes.

Richly aromatic, sweetly tart. Tamarind, gardenia, fir, pistachio, pink grapefruit zest in aroma and cup. Sweetly tarty structure with gently brisk acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Gently drying finish centered around notes of tamarind and fir with pistachio undertones.

coffee_name: Panama Lamastus Family Elida Estate Loma Geisha Washed
review: Elegant, delicate, quietly complex. Bergamot, cocoa nib, apricot, almond, star jasmine in aroma and cup. Malic (apple-like) acidity; vibrant, very silky mouthfeel. Harmonious, integrated, nuanced, finish.

coffee_name: Costa Rica La Pastora Secret Stash
review: Richly sweet-tart, fruity. Watermelon taffy, dark chocolate, salted caramel, cedar, tangerine in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet, tart-leaning acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Crisp, bold finish centers around notes of watermelon taffy and tangerine.

coffee_name: Colombia El Mirador Natural Secret Stash
review: Richly sweet, deeply chocolaty, fruit-forward. Chocolate fudge, strawberry, marjoram, Meyer lemon zest, cashew butter in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; rich, velvety mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of chocolate fudge and marjoram.

High-toned, crisply sweet-tart. Pluot, cocoa nib, Meyer lemon zest, cedar, wisteria in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart structure with juicy, vibrant acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. The finish centers around notes of pluot and cocoa nib with wisteria undertones.

Cocoa-toned, crisply sweet. Cocoa nib, yellow plum, orange zest, cedar, magnolia in aroma and cup. Sweet in structure with crisp, balanced acidity; smooth, silky mouthfeel. Cocoa nib notes carry the finish, with hints of plum and orange zest in the long.

Delicately floral, sweetly tropical. Lilac, lychee, tangerine, cocoa nib, lemon thyme in aroma and cup. Gently bright, floral acidity; crisp, silky-smooth mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish with lychee and tangerine undertones.

coffee_name: Colombia Santa Monica Pink Bourbon Honey Co-Ferment Strawberry
review: Distinctly berry-toned, crisply sweet-tart. Wild strawberry, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, honey, fresh-cut fir in aroma and cup. Gently bright, juicy acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Strawberry and cocoa nib lead in the resonant finish.

Richly sweet-tart, fruit-centered. Bing cherry, hazelnut, candied violet, ginger, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Bright, tartly juicy acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Complex, multi-layered, very long finish.

Fruit-forward, richly sweet-tart. Red currant, almond butter, magnolia, cedar, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Floral-toned finish with rich cedar and sweet currant notes.

Rich-toned, earthy-sweet. Pipe tobacco, date, cedar, rhododendron, sage in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; plush, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, aromatic finish centered around notes of pipe tobacco and date.

Richly aromatic, complex, multi-layered. Star jasmine, blood orange, cocoa nib, lychee, marjoram in aroma and cup. Vibrant, sparkling (phosphoric) acidity; elegant, silky-smooth mouthfeel. Long, aromatic, flavor-saturated finish.

Bright, balanced, tropical-leaning. Passionfruit, ginger blossom, cocoa nib, Meyer lemon zest, amber in aroma and cup. Delicate, high-toned acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. The finish is quietly confident, long and lingering, with notes of cocoa nib, ginger blossom and passionfruit.

coffee_name: Colombia Finca Juan Martin Sidra Natural
review: Richly fruit-centric, flavor-saturated. Lavender, cherry candy, Orange Crush, baking chocolate, oak in aroma and cup. Brisk, citrusy acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Lavender and cherry candy carry the focused finish.

Citrusy-sweet, high-toned. Dried nectarine, almond, candied violet, Meyer lemon, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly tart, citric acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Very long, flavor-saturated finish that honors the promise of the cup.
Candy-like, citrusy. Bergamot, Jolly Rancher, cocoa nib, lemon balm, fresh-cut oak in aroma and cup. Vibrant, citrusy acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Crisp, bittersweet, cocoa-toned finish.

Sweetly citrusy, spice-toned. Pomelo, vanilla orchid, red plum, pink peppercorn, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Balanced, citrusy acidity; very silky, viscous mouthfeel. Vanilla-like florals and pink peppercorn are supported by pomelo and red plum in the resonant finish.

coffee_name: Colombia Cafe La Granja Pink Bourbon
review: Elegant, berry-driven, chocolaty. Wild strawberry, cocoa nib, hop flowers, cedar, tangerine in aroma and cup. Delicately bright, juicy acidity; vibrant, silky mouthfeel. Crisply cocoa-toned, strawberry PopTart finish supported by tangerine.

coffee_name: Taiwan Zou Zhou Yuan Estate Geisha Natural
review: Spice-toned, delicately floral. Rhododendron, white peppercorn, dried pear, mustard greens, cashew in aroma and cup. Crisp, gentle acidity; nicely satiny mouthfeel. Spice-toned finish with notes of white peppercorn and mustard with undertones of rhododendron.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Central Valley Honey Geisha
review: Elegant, nuanced, very sweet. Honey, cocoa nib, walnut, clove, narcissus in aroma and cup. Delicately bright acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Cocoa and nut-toned finish with floral undertones.

coffee_name: Panama Tierra Blanca C-5 Geisha Washed BOP-GW-05
review: Juicy, vibrant, ultra-sweet. Star jasmine, aprium, bergamot, cocoa nib, lemongrass in aroma and cup. Sparkling, very vibrant acidity; silky-smooth, lively mouthfeel. Harmonious, complex, long and lingering finish.

Delicately aromatic, sweetly tart. Cocoa nib, yellow plum, narcissus, almond, maple syrup in aroma and cup. Bright, lively acidity; silky, viscous mouthfeel. Finish centers around notes of cocoa nib and yellow plum.

Balanced, high-toned, juicy-bright. Bing cherry, dark chocolate, freesia, Meyer lemon zest, cedar in aroma and cup. Malic (apple-like) acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Fruit-driven, chocolaty finish into the long.

Richly sweet, floral-toned. Honeysuckle, cantaloupe, pink grapefruit zest, almond, oak in aroma and cup. Gently bright acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Finish leads with notes of cantaloupe and pink grapefruit zest.

coffee_name: Colombia Cafe La Granja Sudan Rume Natural
review: Rich-toned, complex, compelling. Narcissus, black cherry, cardamom, dark chocolate, lemongrass in aroma and cup. Savory-sweet structure with winey acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Flavor-saturated finish led by narcissus and cardamom with undertones of black cherry.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Buku Sayisa G1 Natural
review: Crisply fruit-toned, gently wood-framed. Dried blueberry, cocoa powder, fresh-cut fir, orange zest, marjoram in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; very full, satiny mouthfeel. Wood-framed finish supported by notes of cocoa powder and orange zest.

Evaluated as espresso.Fudgy, roast-rounded. Chocolate fudge, narcissus, hazelnut, coconut, pomegranate in aroma and small cup. Creamy-smooth mouthfeel; resonant, fudgy finish with coconut undertones. In three parts milk, rich-toned, decadent, floral.

Elegant, immersive, unique. Butterscotch, honeysuckle, cocoa nib, coconut, muscat grape, bergamot in aroma and cup. Layered, intense, sparkling acidity; very smooth, syrupy mouthfeel. Long, incense-like finish with notes of honeysuckle and bergamot and undertones of muscat and cocoa nib.

Evaluated as espresso. Rich-toned, sweetly savory and deep. Amber resin, cocoa butter, scorched grapefruit zest, gardenia, almond brittle in aroma and small cup. Plush, roast-buoyed mouthfeel; honeylike finish with smoky amber undertones. In cappuccino format, deeply floral, cocoa-toned, gently smoky in harmony.

coffee_name: Espresso No. 6 Finca San José Ocaña
review: Evaluated as espresso. Complex, nuanced, multi-layered. Chocolate fudge, candied walnut, tamarind, lychee, pink grapefruit zest in aroma and small cup. Creamy, viscous mouthfeel; long, flavor-saturated finish. In cappuccino format, elegantly rich, impeccably sweet, paradoxically delicate and powerful.

coffee_name: Guatemala Finca Santa Isabel SL28 COE #13
review: Chocolaty, richly nut-toned. Dark chocolate, date, almond butter, fresh-cut cedar, tangerine in aroma and cup. Balanced, juicy acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Resonantly sweet finish, chocolaty and deeply nutty.

Complex, deep-toned, confident. Blackberry, violet, roasted coconut, wild honey, blood orange in aroma and cup. Juicy, vibrant acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Flavor-laden finish centered around notes of roasted cocoa nut, blood orange and violet.

coffee_name: Kenya Washed Kiambu Yara Estate PB TOP
review: Bright, juicy, sweetly savory. Black currant, dark chocolate, green tomato, lemon verbena, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Vibrant, sparkling (phosphoric) acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Very long, resonant, compelling and integrated finish, complex and multi-layered.

Brightly sweet-tart, balanced. Red plum, freesia, tangerine zest, almond butter, cedar in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Rich finish that leads with notes of red plum and almond with freesia undertones.

coffee_name: Taiwan Honey Alishan Ming Yang Yuan Gesha
review: Richly fruity, complex. Wild strawberry, cocoa nib, lemon balm, wisteria, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart structure with bright, vibrant acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Long, lingering finish centers around notes of wild strawberry and wisteria supported by gentle sandalwood.

Floral-toned, fruit-saturated. Ginger blossom, wild strawberry, guava, sea moss, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Elegantly bright, sweet-savory acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Very long, fruity, floral finish.

Crisply floral-toned, very fruity. Lilac, wild raspberry, amber, dark chocolate, wild honey in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart structure with delicate, juicy acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Wild raspberry, dark chocolate, and amber-like honey carry the rich finish.

coffee_name: Kenya Washed Kiambu AB TOP Lot Yerihar
review: Resonantly sweet-tart, high-toned. Guava, toffee, pomelo, jasmine, cedar in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart structure with juicy-bright acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. The long, lingering finish centers around notes of toffee and jasmine.

Cocoa-toned, richly sweet-savory. Nectarine, cocoa nib, tangerine, pink peppercorn, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and cup. Bright, sweet-savory acidity; plush very syrupy mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by nectarine and pink peppercorn.

Evaluated as espresso. Richly sweet-tart, crisply chocolaty. Pomegranate, dark chocolate, maple syrup, cedar, magnolia in aroma and small cup. Viscous, full mouthfeel; tart, chocolaty finish. In cappuccino-scaled milk, chocolaty and richly floral-toned.

Richly chocolaty, tangy-sweet. Pineapple kefir, dark chocolate, lychee, amber, lemon balm in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet-tart structure; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Very complex, layered finish that carries over all the aroma and flavor notes of the cup.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Washed Guji Uraga Tebe Burka
review: Quite chocolaty, floral-toned. Dark chocolate, narcissus, hazelnut butter, apricot, satsuma mandarin in aroma and cup. Balanced, bright acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The finish leads with notes of narcissus and dark chocolate.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Natural Sidama ALO Village SKY Project FL
review: Deeply sweet, fruit-driven, lively. Dried apricot, dark chocolate, marjoram, almond, pink grapefruit zest in aroma and cup. Sweet structure with bright, juicy acidity; full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. The crisply fruit-toned finish is complicated by notes of almond and dark chocolate.
Jammy, chocolaty. Milk chocolate, blackberry jam, violet, thyme, oak in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Chocolaty, fruity finish into the long.

Sweetly spice-toned, very rich and deep. Red plum, dark chocolate, cinnamon, amber, freesia in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; plush, lightly creamy mouthfeel. Cinnamon and freesia carry the resonant finish.

coffee_name: Taiwan Natural Alishan Chi Tsai Liu Li Ecological Farm
review: Gently tart, richly high-toned. Meyer lemon zest, dark chocolate, narcissus, agave syrup, fresh-cut cedar in aroma and cup. Zesty, malic (apple-like) acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of sweet citrus and cocoa nib.

Stone fruit-driven, cocoa- and floral-toned. Narcissus, cocoa nib, Bing cherry, lychee, bergamot in aroma and cup. High-toned, sparkling acidity; silky, delicate mouthfeel. Very long, focused finish that carries over all the aroma and flavor notes of the cup.

Fruity, floral, flavor-saturated. Jolly Rancher, star jasmine, ginger root, wild raspberry, frankincense in aroma and cup. Phosphoric, winey acidity; lush, syrupy mouthfeel. Flavor-laden, very long, complex finish.

Brightly sweet-tart; juicy and vibrant. Raspberry, dark chocolate, clove, agave syrup, narcissus in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart structure with very juicy acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Long, lingering fruit-forward finish with deep chocolate undertones.

Evaluated as espresso. Crisp, savory, richly earth-toned. Shiitake mushroom, dark chocolate, pomegranate, hop flowers, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Crisp, satiny mouthfeel; gently drying, chocolaty finish. In cappuccino format, shiitake notes mingle with dark chocolate for a sweet-savory experience.

Deep-toned, richly earth-sweet. Perique tobacco, preserved Meyer lemon, fresh fig, tea rose, myrrh in aroma and cup. Gently bright, balanced acidity; very full, viscous mouthfeel. Integrated, harmonious, floral-toned finish.

coffee_name: Colombia Finca Santuario Red Bourbon Natural
review: Rich-toned, deep and complex. Dried pineapple, lychee, dark chocolate, amber, magnolia in aroma and cup. Balanced, very sweet acidity; viscous, satiny mouthfeel. Resonant, fruit-toned, chocolaty, very long finish.

Bright, juicy, fruit-centered. Apricot, blueberry, nutmeg, cocoa nib, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Juicy-tart structure with citrusy acidity; quite full, syrupy mouthfeel. Long, resonant, flavor-laden finish.

Gently sweet-tart, deeply layered. Dried mulberry, honeysuckle, macadamia butter, cocoa nib, marjoram in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart structure with winey acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of macadamia butter and cocoa nib with undertones of dried mulberry.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Bench Maji Gori Gesha ORO Yeast Natural G1
review: Resonantly floral, gently fruity, cocoa-toned. Cocoa nib, narcissus, pomegranate, Meyer lemon zest, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Juicy, malic acidity; very full, quite satiny mouthfeel. Floral-toned, fruity finish supported by cocoa nib.

Evaluated as espresso. Balanced, rich-toned. Cocoa powder, tamarind, almond butter, molasses, cedar in aroma and small cup. Crisp, velvety mouthfeel; chocolaty, nut-toned finish. Resonantly sweet and chocolaty in three parts milk with inviting undertones of almond butter and tamarind.

Berry-driven, cocoa-toned. Raspberry, cocoa nib, amber, lemon verbena, cedar in aroma and cup. Delicately bright acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of raspberry and cocoa nib with amber undertones.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Muli Garden Natural G1
review: Delicately fruit-toned, spicy-tart. Dark chocolate, dried apricot, lilac, shishito pepper, lime zest in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart structure with brisk acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty, fruity finish, with undertones of lilac.

Deeply savory, richly sweet, quite bright. Tamarind, dark chocolate, green tomato, marjoram, cedar in aroma and cup. Sweetly savory structure with juicy, high-toned acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. The very long, complex finish is savory-leaning and rich.
Quietly sweet, gently savory. Date, cocoa powder, golden raisin, cashew butter, fresh-cut oak in aroma and cup. Brisk, tangy, dry acidity; creamy mouthfeel. Sweetly nutty, cocoa-toned finish.
Richly chocolaty, deep-toned. Dark chocolate, gently scorched oak, almond brittle, pear, gardenia in aroma and cup. Very gentle acidity; creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty, floral-toned finish.

Crisply sweet, gently fruity. Red apple, baking chocolate, Brazil nut, rhododendron, orange zest in aroma and cup. Crisp, even-keeled acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with undertones of Brazil nut and rhododendron.

Richly nutty and chocolaty. Almond nougat, baking chocolate, cranberry, agave syrup, oak in aroma and cup. Round, gentle acidity; very full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Crisply chocolaty, nougat-like finish.

coffee_name: Colombia Wilton Benitez Thermal Shock Red Bourbon
review: Bright, juicy, nuanced. Delicately fruit-centered, richly sweet. Red plum, lemon verbena, myrrh, cocoa nib, watermelon candy in aroma and cup. Crisp, high-toned acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of cocoa nib and lemon verbena.
Crisply floral-toned. Bergamot, narcissus, cocoa nib, almond, marjoram in aroma and cup. Delicately bright acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned, sweetly herbaceous finish.

coffee_name: Panama Elida Estate Geisha Natural ASD T3D Auction Lot EG6
review: Deeply complex, vibrant, rich-toned. Rose, cocoa nib, pistachio, lychee, mangosteen, amber in aroma and cup. Engaging, high-toned, sparkling acidity; crisp, lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Floral-toned, deeply sweet finish.

coffee_name: Colombia Sebastian Ramirez Washed Pink Bourbon
review: Bright, juicy, harmonious. Peach, freesia, pink grapefruit zest, marjoram, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Balanced, high-toned acidity; crisp, delicate mouthfeel. Finish centers around notes of peach and marjoram.

coffee_name: El Salvador La Providencia Maria Pacas Bernadina Honey
review: Nuanced, delicately sweet, honey-toned. Wild honey, cocoa nib, myrrh, tangerine, lilac in aroma and cup. Balanced, juicy acidity; very full, satiny mouthfeel. Long, lingering, lush finish.

coffee_name: Colombia El Vergel Martha Montenegro Rubi Marti Anaerobic
review: Complex, rich-toned. Watermelon candy, dried guava, pineapple taffy, cinnamon, toffee in aroma and cup. Brightly sweet, sparkling acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Harmonious, very long, deep-toned finish.

coffee_name: Colombia Lulo Wonka Wonka & Sebastian Gomez
review: Fruit-forward, deep-toned, enigmatic. Strawberry-guava, candied ginger, star jasmine, myrrh, lemongrass in aroma and cup. Brightly sweet-tart acidity; elegantly silky mouthfeel. Long, lingering, integrated finish.

Crisply sweet, rich-toned. Cocoa nib, dried apricot, narcissus, hazelnut, maple syrup in aroma and cup. Brightly sweet structure with juicy acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. The finish centers around notes of cocoa-toned apricot.

Balanced, floral-toned. Cocoa nib, narcissus, apricot, almond, lemon balm in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; silky, viscous mouthfeel. Cohesive, satisfying finish that fulfills the promise of the cup.

Intensely sweet, deeply aromatic. Magnolia, dried apricot, cocoa nib, lemon drop, pineapple taffy. Tart-savory acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned pineapple taffy and magnolia notes lead in the finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Washed Yirgacheffe Chelbesa SNNPR Gedeo G1
review: Elegantly sweet, spice-toned. Bergamot, plum, cashew, cocoa nib, lilac in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart with vibrant acidity; very silky, viscous mouthfeel. The cocoa-toned finish has undertones of bergamot and plum.

Floral-toned, brightly sweet-tart. Jasmine, red plum, cocoa nib, almond butter lemon balm in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of red plum and almond.

Crisply chocolaty, fruit-toned. Pie cherry, baking chocolate, almond, cedar, sassafras in aroma and cup. Bittersweet structure with gentle acidity; very full, satiny mouthfeel. Sweet-tart, nutty finish with a crisp chocolate throughline.

Gently fruity, richly chocolaty. Dark chocolate, mulberry, cashew butter, orange zest, oak in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; plush, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with citrus and oak undertones.

Gently fruit- and spice-toned. Nutmeg, dried plum, hop flowers, cocoa powder, candied violet in aroma and cup. Gently brisk acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Nutmeg and hop flowers carry the quiet finish.

Rich-toned, deeply sweet. Date, frangipane, freesia, baking chocolate, cedar in aroma and cup. Gently brisk, balanced acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Crisp, chocolaty finish with undertones of date and almond.

Delicately bright, balanced, multi-layered. Apricot, Meyer lemon, rhododendron, cocoa nib, marjoram in aroma and cup. Juicy-sweet, citrusy acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Long, resonant, flavor-saturated finish.
Very sweet, deeply fruit-forward. Passionfruit, blueberry, coconut, dark chocolate, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Bright, malic acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Very long, flavor-saturated finish.

Crisply bittersweet, floral-toned. Osmanthus, hop flowers, fir, orange zest, thyme in aroma and cup. Briskly bittersweet acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Gently drying finish with notes of osmanthus and fir.
