coffee_name: Colombia Pink Champagne El Mirador Blend
review: Delicately fruit-forward, richly floral-toned. Wild raspberry, cocoa nib, narcissus, tangerine, amber in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Exceptionally long, resonant, cohesive finish that maintains the harmony of the cup.

coffee_name: Colombia Nestor Lasso El Diviso Chiroso
review: Delicately fruit-forward, resonantly tart. Pomegranate, lime zest, vanilla kefir, baking chocolate, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of pomegranate, kefir and cedar.
Vibrant, high-toned, sweetly tart. Red plum, almond, lavender, pink grapefruit zest, olive leaf in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Citrusy, spice-toned finish.

Fruit-forward, sweetly tart. Green apple, lemon kefir, amber, cocoa powder, fir in aroma and cup. Tart, gently drying acidity; full, creamy mouthfeel. Crisp, cocoa-driven finish supported by notes of green apple and amber.

coffee_name: Guatemala El Injerto Malawi Geisha Washed
review: Bright, sweet, lyric. An exhilarating range of flowers (rose, wisteria, plum blossom), bergamot, apple, pear, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Sweetly high-toned and satiny in structure. Flavors layer and deepens in a long, resonant finish.

coffee_name: Guatemala El Injerto Legendary Geisha Natural Lot E1-06
review: Intense, richly bright and harmoniously complex. Aromatic orchid, passionfruit, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, honey in aroma and cup. Deeply sweet-tart in structure, full and syrupy in mouthfeel. Chocolate surfaces distinctly in the long, clean finish.

Exceptionally sweet, lushly fruit-toned. Pistachio, ripe strawberry, baking chocolate, cedar, marjoram in aroma and cup. Juicy in structure; plush in mouthfeel. Fruit floods the short finish, rings on in the long.

coffee_name: Guatemala Washed Finca La Hermosa Gesha Peaberry
review: Vibrant, balanced, classic. Cantaloupe, honeysuckle, pistachio, cedar, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Lightly tart, juicy structure; silky and vivacious in mouthfeel. The finish is crisply bright, with a near sugary sweetness.

Gently bright, balanced, classic. Raspberry, sweet cocoa, magnolia, cashew butter, orange zest in aroma and cup. Sweetly bright and gently lively in structure; plush in mouthfeel. Flavor consolidates to orange and cocoa in a quiet but vibrant finish.

Crisp, low-toned, chocolaty. Baking chocolate, orange, toasted coconut, wisteria, macadamia nut in aroma and cup. Bittersweet in structure, plush in mouthfeel. Chocolate takes over in the finish, nicely complicated by orange and flowers.

Balanced, roundly floral- and citrus-toned. Lime, red apple, freesia, almond in aroma and cup. Effervescently buoyant and bright in structure, lightly syrupy in mouthfeel. The herb-toned flowers and citrus ring on in a quiet but long finish.

Roundly bright, sweet. Black cherry, tangerine, cashew, cocoa powder, pear in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-tart in structure; satiny in mouthfeel. Cashew and cocoa powder carry into the cleanly balanced finish.
Crisp, sweet, delicate. Fir, cocoa, macadamia, jasmine, lemon in aroma and cup. Sweetly bright and high-toned in structure, silky mouthfeel. Flavor consolidates in a quiet finish.

Deep, balanced, chocolaty. Rose, dark chocolate, raisin, almond in aroma and cup. Bright, savory-sweet structure; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. The rose-like flowers intensify in the cup and linger in a crisp, drying finish.

Elegantly fruit-centered, richly aromatic. Plum confit, wild honey, frangipane, clove, lavender in aroma and cup. Complex, bittersweet structure with juicy acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Long, mesmerizing finish.

Exceptionally sweet, delicately tart. Lychee, sticky rice, bergamot, sandalwood, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Citrusy-bright acidity; creamy mouthfeel. Richly bittersweet, long finish with notes of bergamot and lychee with sandalwood undertones.

coffee_name: El Salvador Finca Plan del Hoyo Microlot
review: Complex, richly aromatic. Dark chocolate, black cherry, almond butter, lavender, raw honey in aroma and cup. Bright, malic (apple-like) acidity; very smooth, satiny mouthfeel. Resonant, chocolaty finish with undertones of black cherry and lavender.

Richly sweet, complex, floral-toned. Amber, lime zest, narcissus, Nutella, cedar in aroma and cup. Bittersweet structure with balanced, juicy acidity; very smooth, silky mouthfeel. Amber and narcissus notes predominate in the long-lasting finish, supported by nutty chocolate.

coffee_name: Finca La Reserva Colombia Gesha Honey
review: Watermelon candy, magnolia, graphite, almond blossom, dark chocolate in aroma and cup. High-toned, balanced acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Crisp, chocolaty finish supported by notes of watermelon candy and magnolia.
Very sweet, cocoa-toned. Almond nougat, dried strawberry, cocoa nib, pink grapefruit, magnolia in aroma and cup.
Crisp, bittersweet, gently smoky. Cocoa powder, lily, Brazil nut, brown sugar, scorched fir in aroma and cup. No perceptible acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Gently smoky, cocoa-toned finish.
Bright, balanced, juicy. Meyer lemon, red currant, cocoa nib, thyme, freesia in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Very long, flavor-saturated finish.

Crisply sweet, roast-rounded. Golden raisin, gently scorched fir, molasses, gardenia, orange zest in aroma and cup. Soft, muted acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Gently dring finish centered around notes of molasses and gently scorched fir.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama Alice Orchard Natural G1
review: Elegantly fruit-forward, high-toned. Raspberry, guava, dark chocolate, pink grapefruit, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Bright, malic acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty, sweet-tart finish with undertones of sweet citrus notes.

Juicy-bright, sweetly savory. Red currant, sticky rice, cocoa nib, myrrh, tangerine in aroma and cup. High-toned, sparkling (phosphoric) acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Notes of cocoa nib and red currant lead in the solid finish.

Balanced, richly sweet. Halvah, grape candy, freesia, tangerine zest, clove in aroma and cup. Complex, richly layered structure with sweet-tart acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. Very sweet, spiced-toned and floral finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Yirgacheffe Lalisa Black Honey TOH#2
review: Richly fruity, spice-toned. Dried lychee, ginger blossom, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, thyme in aroma and cup. Sweet-savory structure with lively acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. The crisp, inviting finish centers around lychee, ginger and cocoa nib.

coffee_name: Colombia Tolima Villa Karina Bourbon Naranja Honey
review: Deeply sweet-savory. Yellow plum, almond, pink peppercorn, narcissus, cedar in aroma and cup. Complex, bittersweet acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Yellow plum and pink peppercorn notes carry the delicate finish.

Richly sweet, deep-toned. Cocoa nib, star jasmine, black currant, cane sugar, ripe tomato in aroma and cup. Umami-like acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, umami-driven finish with floral undertones.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Bench-Maji Lucy Station Geisha Washed
review: Balanced, brightly sweet-tart. Pluot, narcissus, pink grapefruit zest, almond, cedar in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant finish that leads with notes of pluot and almond.
Rich-toned, flavor-saturated. Concord grape, tangerine, baking chocolate, amber, freesia in aroma and cup. Juicy, balanced acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Citrusy, chocolaty finish.
Gently fruity, cocoa-toned. Tiramisu, lemon verbena, freesia, fresh-cut oak, orange zest in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet acidity, very full, creamy mouthfeel. Citrusy, cocoa-toned finish.

Richly aromatic, delicately fruit-toned. Dried nectarine, pomelo, pink peppercorn, cocoa nib, sticky rice in aroma and cup. Gently brisk acidity; very silky, vibrant mouthfeel. Cocoa nib and dried nectarine carry the easygoing finish.
Crisply fruit-centered. Cocoa powder, raspberry, lime zest, caramel, cedar in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish with caramel and cedar undertones.

coffee_name: Panama Hacienda La Esmeralda Nano GIGANTE 4FC-N Geisha Washed
review: Elegant, plush, floral and multi-layered. Perfectly ripe peach, almond butter, gardenia, Meyer lemon zest, wild honey in aroma and cup. Expressive, juicy-vibrant malic acidity; very syrupy, viscous mouthfeel. Impossibly long, harmonious, all-inclusive finish.

coffee_name: Kenya Washed Kiambu Maganjo AA TOP
review: Richly sweet-savory. Red currant, dark chocolate, thyme, lime zest, coconut in aroma and cup. Very sweet, also very tart acidity (intense, phosphoric); plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Intensely sweet-savory, long-lingering finish.

Evaluated as espresso. Tart, chocolaty. Baking chocolate, pomegranate, fresh-cut fir, caramel, cashew butter in aroma and small cup. Plush, syrupy mouthfeel; crisp, chocolaty and nutty finish. In cappuccino format, fruit and caramel commingle with chocolate and cashew.

Evaluated as espresso. Deeply rich, roast-rounded, floral-toned. Cocoa nib gardenia, marjoram, clove, black cherry in aroma and small cup. Very viscous, syrupy mouthfeel; long, flavor-laden finish. In three parts milk, integrated, coherent, balanced.

Richly floral, vibrantly layered. Star jasmine, cocoa nib, peach, myrrh, Meyer lemon zest in aroma and cup. Juicy-tart, balanced acidity; silky, energetic mouthfeel. Long, resonant finish that makes good on the promise of the cup.

Elegantly sweet-tart, richly floral, complex. Narcissus, tamarind, rice pudding, hazelnut, pink grapefruit in aroma and cup. Sparkling, vibrant acidity; plushly satiny mouthfeel. Floral-toned, multi-layered finish that carries over all the flavor notes from the cup.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Yirgacheffe Huke Premium Washed G1
review: Nuanced, delicate, multi-layered. Sweetly spice-toned, gently herbaceous, richly aromatic. Bergamot, cocoa nib, pink peppercorn, freesia, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Balanced, apple-like (malic) acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Harmonious, integrated, satiating finish.

Bright, very sweet. Almond nougat, red plum, maple syrup, baking chocolate, pink grapefruit in aroma and cup. Juicy, malic acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Resonant finish consolidates to notes of maple syrup and pink grapefruit.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama G1 Bona Zuria Ayele Tulu Honey
review: Crisply sweet-tart. Lychee, agave syrup, fresh-cut oak, sassafras, baking chocolate in aroma and cup. Sweet, delicate acidity; plush, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of agave syrup, oak and baking chocolate.

Rich-toned, brightly and sweetly herbaceous. Pineapple, cocoa nib, bay leaf, tangerine, lavender in aroma and cup. Sweet-savory structure with sparkling acidity; syrupy, viscous mouthfeel. Cocoa-driven finish with undertones of pineapple and lavender.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Yirgacheffe Huke Premium Natural G1
review: Sweet-toned, richly chocolaty. Blueberry, cashew, dark chocolate, lemon verbena, sassafras in aroma and cup. Citrusy acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of blueberry and dark chocolate.

Bright, juicy-tart, chocolaty. Dark chocolate, pie cherry, hazelnut, tangerine, cedar in aroma and cup. Bright, citrusy acidity; creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of pie cherry and dark chocolate.
Sweetly spice-toned. Quince, clove, orange zest, rhododendron, cedar in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Quince and clove notes carry the rich-toned finish.

Deeply floral, richly perfumed. Tea rose, guava, cocoa nib, myrrh, graphite in aroma and cup. Winy acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Flavor-laden finish centered around notes of tea rose, guava and cocoa nib.

Richly chocolaty, floral-toned. Wisteria, dark chocolate, red plum, hazelnut, marjoram in aroma and cup. Lively, sparkling acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of dark chocolate and wisteria with undertones of marjoram.

Richly sweet-tart, vibrant. Apricot, almond nougat, lemongrass, star jasmine, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; silky, viscous mouthfeel. Long, resonant finish showcases apricot, almond and star jasmine notes.

Balanced, sweetly savory. Red currant, almond nougat, cocoa nib, pink grapefruit zest, maple syrup in aroma and cup. Crisp, citrusy acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Red currant and cocoa nib lead in the confident finish, with undertones of pink grapefruit zest.

Richly chocolaty, delicately fruit-toned. Dark chocolate, yellow plum, almond, cedar, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; very full, satiny mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish supported by notes of yellow plum and cedar.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Oromi Guji Hamela Wamena Tirtira Goyo Natural G1
review: Richly sweet-tart, vibrantly aromatic. Tangerine, dried mulberry, dark chocolate, hazelnut, bay leaf in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, flavor-saturated finish that carries over all the aroma and flavor notes from the cup.

Multi-layered, deep-toned. Candied violet, oolong tea, mulberry, frankincense, shiitake in aroma and cup. Sweet-savory structure with delicately bright acidity; quite syrupy mouthfeel. Harmonious, integrated, flavor-laden finish.

Delicately floral, richly sweet. Narcissus, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, red apple, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; velvety mouthfeel. Long, resonant, lingering finish centered around notes of narcissus and cocoa nib with lemon verbena undertones.

Sweetly tart, berry-toned. Blueberry jam, hazelnut, cocoa nib, cedar, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Pert acidity; very syrupy, viscous mouthfeel. Blueberry notes carry the cocoa-toned, cedary finish.
Gooseberry, hazelnut, narcissus, dark chocolate, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Bright, malic acidity; very full syrupy mouthfeel. Long, resonant, flavor-saturated finish.

Citrusy sweet, high-toned. Tangerine, dark chocolate, almond, date, sassafras in aroma and cup. Sparkling, juicy acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Finish centers around notes of tangerine and dark chocolate.

Richly layered, vibrant, engaging. Nectarine, aromatic orchid, almond paste, frankincense tangerine zest in aroma and cup. Intricate, richly layered structure with juicy acidity; viscous, very silky mouthfeel. Perfumed, crisply sweet-tart, rich-toned finish.
Sweet-toned, richly nutty. Cashew, red apple, baking chocolate, nutmeg, oak in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Quiet, chocolaty finish.

Richly floral-toned, cocoa-driven. Wisteria, cocoa nib, apricot, almond, tangerine zest in aroma and cup. Delicately bright, balanced acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Long, resonant, flavor-saturated, floral finish.

Crisply sweet, richly chocolaty. Baking chocolate, orange zest, coconut, apple blossom, nougat in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Nougaty finish with undertones of orange zest.

coffee_name: El Salvador Ojo de Agua Carlos Poa
review: Deep-toned, sweetly savory. Red plum, freesia, cocoa nib, agave syrup, bay leaf in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Sweet-toned finish centered around notes of freesia and cocoa nib.

Crisply sweet, balanced. Date, brown sugar, pink grapefruit zest, marjoram, baking chocolate in aroma and cup. Delicately bright acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Long, resonant finish with notes of date and pink grapefruit zest.
Sweet-toned, crisply caramelly. Brown sugar, rhododendron, date, honey, fir in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet acidity; quite full, creamy mouthfeel. Brown sugar and fir notes carry the resonant finish.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Las Lajas Black Diamond Bourbon
review: Very bright and juicy, tropical-leaning. Kiwi, lychee, dark chocolate, pikake flower, dried mandarin in aroma and cup. Vivid, expressively bright acidity; very full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Fruity, chocolaty, very long and flavor-saturated finish that leads with notes of kiwi and dark chocolate.
Bright, balanced, juicy. Guava, dark chocolate, almond nougat, narcissus, tangerine in aroma and cup. Sparkling, phosphoric acidity; vibrant, syrupy mouthfeel. Chocolaty, tropical finish.

Richly floral-toned, very sweet. Rhododendron, black cherry, fresh sugarcane, baking chocolate, hazelnut in aroma and cup. Malic (apple-like) acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of rhododendron and baking chocolate.

coffee_name: Panama Hacienda La Esmeralda Special Nano Geisha Gigante Washed Euphora Lot
review: Intricate, delicate, laser-focused. Lychee, bergamot, cocoa nib, lemongrass, myrrh in aroma and cup. Lyrically balanced, juicy, high-toned acidity; very smooth, viscous, silky mouthfeel. Long, lingering harmonious, resonant finish.

Balanced, high-toned, multi-layered. Dried plum, genmaicha tea, lemon balm, candied violet, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Notes of dried plum and genmaicha tea are foregrounded in the pleasing finish.

coffee_name: Finca La Secreta Colombia Lychee Co-Ferment
review: Sweetly fruit-toned, crisply floral. Distinct lychee, freesia, baking chocolate, amber, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; crisp, syrupy mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with notes of lychee and amber.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Yirgacheffe Citrus Glow Washed G1
review: Cocoa-toned, gently fruity. Cocoa nib, red plum, caramel, tangerine, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Bright, sweetly tart acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Cocoa-driven finish with undertones of tangerine and lemon verbena.
Crisply chocolaty, berry-toned. Blackberry, hazelnut, baking chocolate, marjoram, fir in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty, sweetly herbaceous finish.

Crisply sweet, quietly confident. Dried plum, baking chocolate, hazelnut, brown sugar, lily in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet, citrusy acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Finish centers around notes of dried plum and baking chocolate.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama Berry Mousse Natural G1
review: Berry-toned, richly sweet. Raspberry coulis, almond, green grape, freesia, cedar in aroma and cup. Gently brisk acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to pretty notes of raspberry and almond.

Juicy, berry- and citrus-toned. Mulberry, tangelo zest, cherimoya, freesia, fresh-cut pine in aroma and cup. Brisk, bittersweet acidity; plush, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Richly sweet finish that leads with notes of mulberry and tangelo zest.

Crisply sweet, cocoa-toned. Cocoa nib, dried apricot, walnut, magnolia, maple syrup in aroma and cup. Balanced, sweet structure with high-toned acidity; satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Crisply chocolaty supported by notes of dried apricot and walnut.

coffee_name: Natural Brazil Peaberry from Black Coffee Producers
review: Crisply sweet, nut-toned. Cashew butter, goji berry, orange zest, freesia, oak in aroma and cup. Sweet, gentle acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. The finish is centered around sweet cashew and orange zest notes.

Sweet-toned, multi-layered. Apricot, almond, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, maple syrup in aroma and cup. Gently bright, balanced acidity; delicate, silky mouthfeel. Sweetly herbaceous finish supported by cocoa nib.

Sweetly savory, tangily fruity. Red currant, cocoa nib, pineapple kefir, lime zest, hop flowers in aroma and cup. Pert, acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to cocoa nib and pineapple kefir.

Rich-toned, complex, bittersweet. Dark chocolate, sweet tobacco, dried fig, nutmeg, molasses in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Brisk finish carried by dark chocolate and tobacco notes.

Crisply sweet, cocoa-toned. Baking chocolate, caramel, hazelnut, red grape, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Caramelly finish with undertones of hazelnut and cedar.

Quietly sweet, nut-toned. Brazil nut, cocoa powder, lily, raisin, fir in aroma and cup. Sweet but somewhat harsh acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Dry, wood-framed finish with hints of Brazil nut and lily.

Crisply chocolaty, sweetly nut-toned. Baking chocolate, cashew butter, orange zest, agave syrup, fresh-cut oak in aroma and cup. Gently bright, sparkling acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to baking chocolate and cashew with oak undertones.
Balanced, briskly sweet. Baking chocolate, almond, brown sugar, date, cedar in aroma and cup. Sweet, apple-like acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Nutty-sweet finish supported by cedar notes.

coffee_name: Brown Bear Melange AKA Kyle’s Blend
review: Chocolaty, smoky-sweet. Chocolate fudge, dried plum, scorched mesquite, molasses, tangerine zest in aroma and cup. Round, barely perceptible acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Gently drying finish with notes of tangerine zest and scorched mesquite.

Roast-muted, chocolaty and smoky. Scorched fir, baking chocolate, salted peanut, bay leaf, hint of gardenia in aroma and cup. No perceptible acidity; rough-edged, slightly astringent mouthfeel. Dry, peanutty finish with smoky wood and chocolate undertones.

Burnt, acrid, harsh, sweetly composty. Charcoal, floral soap, stale walnuts, vegetal compost, hint of medicinal taint in aroma and cup. Sharp, harsh acidity; cloying, tannic, heavy mouthfeel. Composty, medicinal finish.
Sweet-savory, muted. Carob, lily, stale raisin, fir, sassafras in aroma and cup. Harsh acidity; thin, inert mouthfeel. Carob-driven finish with undertones of lily and sassafras.

Acrid, bittersweet. Carob, lily, raisin, scorched fir, green bean in aroma and cup. Burnt, bitter structure with only vague sweetness; thin, cloying mouthfeel. Ashen, medicinal flavor dominates the bitter finish.

Berry-toned, intensely sweet. Dried mulberry, marjoram, cocoa nib, freesia, watermelon candy in aroma and cup. Lively, sparkling (phosphoric) acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Concentrated finish carried by dried mulberry and freesia notes with undertones of cocoa nib.

Gently fruity, cocoa-toned. Blueberry, lemon verbena, cocoa nib, agave syrup, cedar in aroma and cup. Crisp, briskly sweet acidity; very smooth, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of cocoa-toned blueberry and cedar.

Berry-toned, sweetly tart. Raspberry, salted caramel, lemon balm, dried goji berry, cedar in aroma and cup. Sweetly-tart acidity; plush syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant, berry-toned finish supported by notes of lemon balm and caramel.
Crisply sweet-savory. Cashew, cocoa powder, goji berry, bay leaf, brown sugar in aroma and cup. Pert acidity; velvety mouthfeel. Sweetly nutty finish with undertones of cocoa powder and brown sugar.

coffee_name: Colombia Wilton Benitez Striped Bourbon Thermal Shock
review: Bright, juicy, floral-toned. Tangerine, plumeria (frangipani) red plum, cocoa nib, tarragon in aroma and cup. Sparkling (phosphoric) acidity; delicately satiny, very smooth mouthfeel. The resonant finish carries over all the flavor notes from the cup.

Evaluated as espresso. Roast-rounded, crisply chocolaty. Baking chocolate, pie cherry, gently scorched oak, lily, sassafras in aroma and cup. Satiny mouthfeel; gently drying, chocolaty, wood-framed finish with subtle smoke notes. In cappuccino format, sweet chocolate notes carry the cup, with undertones of lilly and gently scorched oak.

High-toned, richly chocolaty. Dark chocolate, magnolia, hazelnut, pink peppercorn, lemongrass in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. The chocolaty, sweetly nutty finish is redolent of Nutella.

Evaluated as espresso. Chocolaty-sweet, rich-toned. Pomegranate, baking chocolate, almond,gently scorched fir, dark caramel in aroma and small cup. Creamy-smooth mouthfeel; crisp, chocolaty finish with almond and smoky fir undertones. In three parts milk, chocolaty and floral (magnolia notes emerge).

Complex, richly sweet-tart. Strawberry-guava, kumquat, narcissus, raw cacao, amber in aroma and cup. Juicy, citric acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Flavor-laden finish led by notes of strawberry-guava and amber with support from kumquat.

coffee_name: Colombia Wilton Benitez Gesha Thermal Shock Wine Yeast
review: Very sweet, tropical and floral-toned. Vanilla orchid, guava, dried ginger, kola nut, lemongrass in aroma and cup. Vibrant, juicy acidity; silky, viscous mouthfeel. Exceptionally long, harmonious, integrated finish.

Rich-toned, chocolaty. Baking chocolate, heavy cream, orange zest, date, maple syrup in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish with undertones of orange zest and date.
Juicy-sweet, deep-toned. White peach, narcissus, cocoa nib, oak, almond in aroma and cup. High-toned acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Cocoa-driven, floral finish.

Delicately sweet-tart, complex. Sweetly herbaceous, citrusy. Cocoa nib, kumquat, lemon thyme, amber, sugarcane in aroma and cup. Balanced, malic (apple-like) acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Herby, cocoa-toned finish.

Rich-toned, very sweet. Butterscotch, pistachio, tangerine, black cherry, cedar in aroma and cup. Bright, vibrant acidity; crisp, lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Inviting finish centered around notes of butterscotch and tangerine.

Sweetly tart, gently herbaceous. Meyer lemon zest, bay leaf, baking chocolate, date, myrrh in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Especially long, vibrant finish with lingering notes of baking chocolate, date and myrrh.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Djimma Limu Gummay Baby Geisha Washed
review: High-toned, richly sweet-tart, citrusy. Wild honey, sandalwood, pomelo, lavender, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Balanced, sweet-tart acidity; plush, viscous mouthfeel. Flavor-laden finish redolent of wild honey and lavender supported by cocoa nib.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Gesha Village Oma Gesha 1931 Natural
review: Lush, floral, deeply aromatic, floral-toned. Wisteria, pink peppercorn, dried mango, bergamot, cocoa nib  in aroma and cup. Delicately bright, vibrant acidity; full, syrupy smooth mouthfeel. Crisp, floral finish with undertones of pink peppercorn.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Yirgacheffe Kochere Halo Hartume Washed G1
review: High-toned, delicately juicy. Apricot, almond, magnolia, bergamot, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of cocoa nib and apricot.

Balanced, sweetly tart, chocolaty. Dark chocolate, Bing cherry, roasted almond, grapefruit zest, marjoram in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-tart acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Crisply chocolaty finish with undertones of grapefruit and almond.

Richly sweet, even-keeled, nuanced. Dark chocolate, plum blossom, maple syrup, date, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Delicately bright acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Flavor-saturated finish centers around notes of dark chocolate and plum blossom.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Gedeo Yirgacheffe Gerbota Washed G1
review: Crisp, brightly sweet-savory. Apricot, lemon balm, baking chocolate, cedar, pink grapefruit zest in aroma and cup. Richly bittersweet structure with bright acidity; lightly satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Quiet finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and lemon balm.

Crisply chocolaty, well-balanced. Baking chocolate, date, magnolia, cedar, orange est in aroma and cup. Bright, vibrant acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish supported by notes of cedar and orange zest.

Crisply chocolaty, sweetly nut-toned. Baking chocolate, cashew butter, sassafras, orange zest, fresh-cut oak in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; velvety mouthfeel. Gently drying finish centered around notes of cashew and oak.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Natural Sidama Bensa Blue Donkey 24/1
review: Richly aromatic, deeply sweet-tart. Dark chocolate, kumquat, amber, star jasmine, salted caramel in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart, malic acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Very long, focused finish with dark chocolate, complex citrus, and undertones of amber.

Gently tart, fruit-toned. Raspberry, fresh-cut fir, cocoa powder, orange zest, cane sugar in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweetly tart acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Wood-framed finish with cocoa powder and orange zest undertones.

Crisply sweet, chocolaty. Baking chocolate, hazelnut, lemon balm, cedar, lily in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet-toned acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and lily.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Las Lajas SL28 Double-Diamond Anaerobic Natural
review: Rich-toned, sweetly tart. Baking chocolate, almond butter, black cherry, pineapple kefir, sticky rice in aroma and cup. Sweet, even-keeled acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Finish centers around notes of baking chocolate and almond butter.

coffee_name: Peru Black Honey Los Santos Farm Gesha
review: Sweetly spice-toned, rich and deep. Bergamot, black tea, white nectarine, cocoa nib, sticky rice in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by sweet spice notes.

coffee_name: Peru Washed Los Santos Farm Gesha
review: High-toned, multi-layered. Milk chocolate, narcissus, date, pomegranate, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Resonant, flavor-laden, integrated finish.
Berry-toned, very sweet. Mulberry, bay leaf, tamarind, tangerine zest, cedar in aroma and cup. Balanced, high-toned acidity; quite syrupy mouthfeel. Tamarind and mulberry carry the quiet finish.

Gently bright, deep-toned. Concord grape, sandalwood, fudgesicle, cashew, rhododendron in aroma and cup. Delicately bright, balanced acidity; very viscous, satiny mouthfeel. Finish leads with notes of Concord grape and rhododendron with fudgesicle undertones.

Cocoa-toned, richly sweet-savory. Cocoa nib, red currant, hop flowers, almond butter, sugar cane in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by almond butter and sugar cane.

Sweetly herbaceous, delicately fruity. Nectarine, sage, almond, coconut saltwater taffy, fir in aroma and cup. Briskly bittersweet acidity; very full, creamy mouth feel. Notes of sweet almond, sage and fir lead in the quiet finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama West Arsi Nansebo Natural G1
review: Richly fruit-forward, juicy-bright. Dried mango, honey, wisteria, tangerine, macadamia nut in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart structure with vibrant, sparkling acidity; very full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Dried mango and macadamia notes are supported by wisteria and tangerine in the confident finish.

High-toned, sweetly tart. Raspberry, hazelnut, amber, cocoa nib, freesia in aroma and cup. Crisp, citrusy acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Exceptionally resonant, lingering finish that carries over all the aroma and flavor notes from the cup.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Moonlight Delight Wine Process Natural
review: Fruit-forward, sweetly fermenty. Guava, cocoa nib, narcissus, grappa barrel, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; full, very syrupy mouthfeel. Finish is cocoa-laden and fruity-tart.

Candy-like, elegantly sweet. Juicy Fruit gum, Jolly Rancher, Nutella, sandalwood, mandarinquat in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Candy-sweet finish carried by notes of Juicy Fruit gum and Jolly Rancher.

Tart-leaning, cocoa-toned. Cocoa powder, crabapple, marjoram, hazelnut, lily in aroma and cup. Briskly tart acidity; plush creamy mouthfeel. Gently drying finish is carob-like in its sweetness, supported by notes of sweet hazelnut.

Gently sweet-tart, cocoa toned. Tamarind, cocoa powder, red apple, amber, freesia in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Tamarind and cocoa powder lead in the quiet finish.

Caramel-toned, richly wood-framed. Gently scorched fir, dark caramel, lily, raisin, bay leaf in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-savory acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Wood-framed finish with caramel undertones.

Crisply sweet, chocolaty. Baking chocolate, pink grapefruit, pie cherry, cedar, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and pie cherry.

High-toned, sweetly tart. Guava kefir, hazelnut, dark chocolate, hint of aged grappa, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Tart-leaning, citrusy acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Long, enticing, flavor-saturated finish.

Balanced, richly sweet, complex. Chocolate fudge, narcissus, date, cedar, lemon balm in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. The resonant finish centers around notes of chocolate fudge and narcissus with undertones of date.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Washed Bench Maji Baby Lucy Gesha
review: Lushly floral, deeply chocolaty. Star jasmine, dark chocolate, amber, lemon balm, bergamot in aroma and cup. Brightly sweet, balanced acidity; vibrant, silky-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish supported by notes of bergamot and amber.

Boldly floral-toned, cocoa-driven. Honeysuckle, mulberry, dark chocolate, pistachio, pomelo in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart, malic (apple-like) acidity; plush, creamy  mouthfeel. The bright, resonant finish is as juicily confident as it is long.

coffee_name: Brazil Ipanema Premier Cru Cherry Cold Drip
review: A ready-to-drink black coffee, tested cold. Richly sweet-tart, juicy-bright. Dark caramel, tangerine, guava, dark chocolate, hazelnut. Brightly sweet-tart, high-toned acidity; silky, viscous mouthfeel. Sweet finish with notes of dark caramel and guava. Milk amplifies the sweetness and softens the tart fruit notes.

Deeply nuanced, elegant, rich-toned. Lavender, dark chocolate, passionfruit, amber, pineapple sage in aroma and cup. Juicy, vibrant acidity; very syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. The finish is long, juicy, resonant and bright.

coffee_name: Taiwan Natural Meishan Ching-Ye Farm Lot 0116
review: Delicately sweet-tart, juicy and bright. Dried apricot, cocoa nib, kumquat, maple syrup, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Winy acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of cocoa nib and pink peppercorn with undertones of kumquat.

Balanced, bright, richly aromatic. Blackberry jam, hazelnut, baking chocolate, lemon verbena, sage in aroma and cup. Gently bright, citrusy acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Blackberry notes take center stage in the finish, with undertones of baking chocolate and lemon verbena.

Richly aromatic, floral- and spice-toned. Tea rose, nutmeg, pomegranate, lemon-thyme, cedar in aroma and cup. Bright, apple-like (malic) acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Floral- and spice-toned finish with notes of tea rose and nutmeg.

Tangy-sweet, fruit-driven. Muscat grape, strawberry yogurt, dark chocolate, maple syrup, candycap mushroom in aroma and cup. Tangy, juicy acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Dark chocolate and muscat notes are front and center in the resonant finish.

Delicately fruit-toned, richly bittersweet. Lychee, raspberry, cocoa nib, sassafras, hop flowers in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet acidity; lightly syrupy, quite viscous mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by lychee and sassafras.

Brightly sweet-tart, balanced. Nectarine, almond butter, tangerine, fresh-cut oak, bay leaf in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. FInish consolidates to notes of nectarine and bay leaf.

Crisply sweet-tart. Dried plum, baking chocolate, lemon zest, thyme, cane sugar in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Gently crisp finish with notes of baking chocolate and lemon zest.

Richly chocolaty, floral-toned. Dark chocolate, lily, almond, date, tamarind in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Crisp chocolate and sweet lily notes carry the resonant finish.

coffee_name: Tanzania Karatu Acacia Hills Geisha Washed AB Espresso
review: Evaluated as espresso. Richly sweet-tart, multi-layered. Black cherry, tamarind, lemon-thyme, cedar, magnolia in aroma and small cup. Very syrupy, viscous mouthfeel; tart-leaning finish with notes of tamarind and lemon-thyme. In cappuccino format, like cherry pie, equal parts sweet and tart.
Sweetly savory, fruit-prominent. Dried mango, papaya, toffee, dark chocolate, lilac in aroma and cup. Winy acidity; crisp, syrupy mouthfeel. Mango and toffee carry the resonant finish.

Complex, multi-layered. Dark chocolate, goji berry pineapple kefir, mint, jasmine in aroma and cup. Juicy, sweetly savory acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to dark chocolate and mint with hints of pineapple kefir.
Crisply sweet, gently tart. Apricot, almond butter, plumeria, tangerine, elm in aroma and cup. Balanced, sweet-toned acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Almondy finish with hints of tangerine and elm.

Rich-toned, gently smoky. Cocoa butter, golden raisin, lily, scorched oak, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Low perceived acidity, roundly sweet structure; creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish leads with notes of smoky cocoa and lily.

Delicate, intricate, complex. Blackberry jam, milk chocolate, pralines, magnolia, amber in aroma and cup. Vibrant, sparkling acidity; lithe, silky mouthfeel. Long, lingering, flavor-laden finish that carries all the aromas and flavors of the cup into the long.

Balanced, brightly sweet-tart. White peach, watermelon candy, agave syrup, pink grapefruit zest, lilac in aroma and cup. Floral-toned acidity; very silky-smooth mouthfeel. Lilac and watermelon notes carry the easygoing finish.

Fruit-toned, sweetly herbaceous. Lychee, guava, cocoa nib, pennyroyal, wisteria in aroma and cup. High-toned, confident acidity; plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Long, integrated finish centered around notes of guava and pennyroyal.

Sweetly pungent, bold-toned. Baking chocolate, date, gently scorched oak, caramel, orange zest in aroma and cup. Briskly bittersweet acidity; full, lightly syrupy mouthfeel. Crisp, caramelly finish with undertones of gently scorched oak and date.

Evaluated as espresso. Deep-toned, invitingly bittersweet. Pomegranate, hop flowers, maple syrup, lily, almond in aroma and small cup. Creamy-smooth mouthfeel; crisp, sweetly tart finish. In cappuccino format, richly almondy with undertones of pomegranate and hop flowers.

Bright, juicy, intensely aromatic. Distinct green apple, kumquat, raw cacao, marjoram, wild honey in aroma and cup. Tart-leaning, citrusy acidity; quite full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Crisply tart finish with notes of kumquat and cacao.

Uniquely composed, tangy-sweet. Dried apricot, pineapple kefir, dark chocolate, sandalwood, pink grapefruit zest in aroma and cup. Juicy, balanced acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish leads with notes of pineapple kefir and dark chocolate.

Balanced, fruit-toned. Lychee, almond, green grape, red wine barrel, cardamom in aroma and cup. Gently bright acidity; round, viscous mouthfeel. Quietly intriguing finish that leads with notes of lychee and cardamom.

Deep-toned, multi-layered. Black cherry, hazelnut, agave syrup, tangerine, rich cedar in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; full, creamy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of black cherry and tangerine with cedar undertones.

Richly cocoa-toned, gently citrusy. Cocoa nib, pink grapefruit zest, red grape, marjoram, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of cocoa nib and pink grapefruit.

Sweetly tart, citrusy. Lemon verbena, pomelo, cocoa nib, almond butter, candied violet in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-tart acidity; plush, very syrupy mouthfeel. Almond and lemon verbena notes carry the resonant finish.

coffee_name: Colombia La Palma Y Tucán Heroes Series Geisha
review: Candy-sweet. Watermelon bubble gum, candy apple, pineapple saltwater taffy, sandalwood, kumquat in aroma and cup. Delicately bright acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Very sweet finish centered around notes of watermelon bubble gum and pineapple saltwater taffy.

Chocolaty, balanced, bright. Dark chocolate, nectarine, lemon balm, fresh-cut oak, pink peppercorn in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Chocolate and nectarine center the confident finish.

Sweetly pungent, rich-toned. Blackberry shrub, tangerine, cocoa nib, narcissus, amber in aroma and cup. Crisp, even-keeled acidity; smooth, silky mouthfeel. Long, lingering, harmonious and resonant finish.

Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly nut-toned. Cashew butter, cocoa powder, date, freesia, fir in aroma and small cup. Viscous, syrupy mouthfeel; gently drying, cocoa-toned finish. In cappuccino format, chocolate and cashew notes are amplified, while florals recede.

Evaluated as espresso. Roast-rounded; sweetly wood-framed. Fresh-cut cedar, golden raisin, Brazil nut, sassafras, pomegranate in aroma and small cup. Crisp, velvety mouthfeel; cedary finish with pomegranate undertones. In three parts milk, crisply chocolaty and gently sweet-tart.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama Orange Blossom Washed G1
review: Complex, sweetly citrusy. Bergamot, bay leaf, cocoa nib, violet, pink grapefruit in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; silky, viscous mouthfeel. Resonant, citrusy finish with notes of bergamot and pink grapefruit supported by cocoa nib.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Washed Sidama Bensa Single Variety 74158
review: Floral-toned, very fruity. Guava, lilac, pralines, cane sugar, calamansi in aroma and cup. Sweet-tart structure with sparkling acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. The rich-toned finish leads with notes of lilac and guava, supported by richly bitter-tart calamansi.

Sweetly tart, fruit-forward. Mango, baking chocolate, lemongrass, honey, fresh-cut fir in aroma and cup. Juicy-sweet acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Lemongrass and baking chocolate predominate in the finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Floral Blueberry Natural G1
review: Crisply sweet, rich-toned. Dried blueberry, baking chocolate, gardenia, grapefruit zest, hazelnut in aroma and cup. Round, fruity acidity; full, creamy mouthfeel. Hazelnut and grapefruit zest predominate in the finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Washed Guji Uraga Tome Variety 74110
review: Balanced, sweetly tart. Cocoa nib, apricot, narcissus, almond, brown sugar in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; crisp, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish centers around notes of cocoa nib and apricot.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama Berry Gummies 74158 Natural G1
review: High-toned, sweetly tart. Watermelon candy, salted caramel, lemon balm, cedar, amber in aroma and cup. Balanced, juicy acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. Gently drying finish centers around notes of salted caramel and lemon balm.

Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly nut-toned, delicately early. Roasted almond, date, baking chocolate, tamarind, fresh humus in aroma and small cup. Creamy-smooth mouthfeel; crisply sweet, almondy finish. In three parts milk, date and tamarind notes take center stage, supported by baking chocolate.

Complex, deep-toned, flavor-saturated. Satsuma, almond butter, narcissus, marjoram, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; crisp, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of satsuma and almond butter.

Melony-sweet, deep-toned. Cantaloupe, amber, narcissus, bay leaf, cinnamon in aroma and cup. Gentle, balanced acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. The sweet finish leads with notes of cantaloupe and amber.

Richly fruit-forward, floral-toned. Watermelon candy, violet, orange soda, banana saltwater taffy, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Juicy, sparkling acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Fruity, rich-toned finish, long and lingering.

Sweetly herbaceous, deeply rich. Dark chocolate, pomegranate, lemongrass, cedar, magnolia in aroma and cup. Balanced, even-keeled acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish supported by pomegranate undertones.
Crisply spice-toned, fruit-centered. Mulberry, clove, candy apple, magnolia, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Spice-toned finish with floral undertones.

coffee_name: Colombia José Julián Giraldo Pink Bourbon Panela Sticky
review: Sweetly citrusy, nectar-like. Tangerine, dried apricot, agave syrup, amber, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Long, resonant flavor-saturated finish.

Deeply sweet-savory, quietly complex. Tamarind, narcissus, hop flowers, brown sugar, marjoram in aroma and cup. Gently bright acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Resonant finish consolidates to notes of tamarind and narcissus.

Juicy, floral-toned, richly sweet-savory. Red currant, cocoa nib, star jasmine, pistachio, myrrh in aroma and cup. Sparkling (phosphoric) acidity; smooth, viscous mouthfeel. Quietly confident finish consolidates to notes of red currant and cocoa nib.

Brightly sweet, gently tart. Pink grapefruit, cocoa nib, freesia, elm, bergamot in aroma and cup. High-toned, citrusy acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by notes of pink grapefruit and bergamot.

coffee_name: Kenya Washed Kirinyaga Getuya AA Top
review: Elegantly sweet-savory, deeply nuanced, richly aromatic. Red currant, dark chocolate, plumeria, sandalwood, wild honey in aroma and cup. Juicy, sparkling acidity; very smooth, syrupy mouthfeel. Harmonious, integrated, very long finish.

Evaluated as espresso. Richly chocolaty, tartly fruity. Dark chocolate, pomegranate, lemon verbena, cedar, orange blossom in aroma and small cup. Plush, viscous mouthfeel; chocolaty finish with undertones of orange blossom. In cappuccino format, pomegranate resurfaces as a bold counterpart to the chocolate throughline.

coffee_name: Colombia Linarco Rodriguez Ospina Pink Bourbon Washed 94
review: Delicately bright, balanced, richly sweet-tart. Red plum and cocoa nib in the aroma, deepening into Meyer lemon zest, shortbread and lilac in the cup. Gently bright, vibrant acidity; plush, silky mouthfeel. Very rich, multi-layered finish, deeply aromatic finish.

Rich-toned, flavor-saturated. Black currant, magnolia, dark chocolate, candied walnut, hint of smoked paprika in aroma and cup. Sweet-savory structure with elegantly juicy acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Richly chocolaty finish with undertones of black currant and candied walnut.

Evaluated as espresso. Lychee, caramel, hazelnut butter, redwood, brown sugar in aroma and small cup. Creamy-smooth mouthfeel; integrated, coherent finish. In three parts milk, all of the notes from the straight shot carry over and freesia also emerges.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Uraga Haro Adama Washed G1
review: Richly sweet, spice-toned. Bergamot, pistachio, dark chocolate, lilac, honey in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart with juicy acidity; very silky mouthfeel. The chocolaty supports top notes of bergamot and lilac.

coffee_name: Guatemala Honey Finca El General Gesha
review: Floral-toned, deeply aromatic. Wisteria, bergamot, frangipane, frankincense, pluot in aroma and cup. High-toned, sweetly crisp acidity; very syrupy mouthfeel. Floral, citrusy finish supported by stone fruit.

Crisp, juicy, high-toned. Dried mango, cocoa nib, lemon balm, thyme, magnolia in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart, green apple-like acidity; vibrantly silky mouthfeel. Fruit-forward finish, cocoa-toned, and supported by rich florals and sweet herbs.

Very sweet, crisply chocolaty. Baking chocolate, red apple, maple syrup, bay leaf, clover blossom in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; very syrupy, vibrant mouthfeel. The finish centers around notes of baking chocolate and sweet red apple.

coffee_name: Colombia Edwin Enrique Noreña / Black Honey Watermelon & Lulo Co-Ferment
review: Nectar-like, sweetly tart, rich-toned. Watermelon candy, cocoa butter, loquat, freesia, graphite in aroma and cup. High-toned, phosphoric acidity; syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Sweet, long, candy-like finish

coffee_name: Colombia Edwin Enrique Noreña / Black Honey Pink Bourbon Mosto & Passionfruit Co-Ferment
review: Tropical, deep, harmonious. Passionfruit, star jasmine, myrrh, cocoa nib, pineapple saltwater taffy in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; crisp, syrupy mouthfeel. Resonantly fruity and floral finish.

coffee_name: Colombia Edwin Enrique Noreña Pink Bourbon
review: Flavor-laden, aromatically exuberant. Passionfruit, elderberry, lemon-thyme, pomelo, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Tropical finish with fruit and sweet herb notes front and center.

Crisply chocolaty, nut-toned. Baking chocolate, Fig Newton, almond butter, Meyer lemon zest, magnolia in aroma and cup. Gently bright acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Crisply sweet, nut-driven finish.
Richly spice-toned, delicately sweet. Nutmeg, guava, narcissus, almond, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; velvety mouthfeel. Especially lush, integrated finish.

Clean, harmoniously balanced. Mulberry, lychee, marjoram, azalea, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Malic (apple-like) acidity; elegant, silky mouthfeel. Berry-toned finish supported by notes of sweet herbs.

High-toned, sweetly tart. Watermelon candy, blueberry, freesia, hazelnut, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Tart-leaning, winy acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Fruity-sweet finish with undertones of freesia and cocoa nib.

coffee_name: Colombia Edwin Enrique Noreña Juice Box Processing Set / Natural Carbonic Maceration
review: Floral-toned, very, very sweet. Tea rose, candied apple, agave syrup, dark chocolate, orange marmalade in aroma and cup. Gently brisk acidity; creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Citrusy finish with undertones of tea rose.

Balanced, bright, fruit-forward. Dried plum, almond, freesia, honey, baking chocolate in aroma and cup. Sweet-toned, round acidity; plush creamy mouthfeel. Especially resonant, flavor-laden finish that fulfills the promise of the cup.

coffee_name: Kona Geisha Peaberry Yeast Fermentation Washed
review: Elegantly bright, floral-toned. Wisteria, lemongrass, dried nectarine, cocoa nib, bergamot in aroma and cup. Balanced, high-toned acidity; silky, viscous mouthfeel. Long, lingering, satisfying finish
Sweetly nut-toned. Cashew butter, caramel, oak, lily, brown sugar in aroma and cup. Pert acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Cashew and brown sugar notes carry the finish.

Delicately bright, sweetly tart. Apricot, hazelnut, cocoa nib, lemon balm, cedar in aroma and cup. Gently sweet acidity; crisp, syrupy mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by notes of hazelnut and lemon balm.
Richly sweet, delicately tart. Tamarind, dried mango, cocoa nib, marjoram, cedar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet, gentle acidity; full, syrupy smooth mouthfeel. Crisp, sweetly tart finish.

coffee_name: Colombia El Paraiso Lychee Rose Cold Drip
review: A ready-to-drink black coffee, tested cold. Deep-toned, rich-tart-savory. Asian pear, pipe tobacco, pink peppercorn, blood orange, cocoa nib. Brightly sweet, delicately tart acidity; round, plump, very smooth mouthfeel. Crisply sweet-savory finish. Milk brings up the richness and savory impulses while also highlighting pipe tobacco notes.

A ready-to-drink black coffee, tested cold. Brightly fruit-forward. Guava, magnolia, baking chocolate, lemon-thyme, cedar. Crisp, citrusy acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Guava and magnolia carry the clean finish. With milk, tart fruit notes recede and florals and chocolate are foregrounded.

A ready-to-drink black coffee, tested cold. Balanced, crisply chocolaty, sweetly nutty. Baking chocolate, hazelnut, rhododendron, fresh-cut oak, tangerine zest. Gentle, round acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Nut-driven finish with tangerine undertones. With a splash of milk, kind of like a Snickers bar with hazelnuts instead of almonds.

coffee_name: Extra Strong Cold Brew Straight Black
review: A ready-to-drink black coffee, tested cold. Deep-toned, flavor-saturated. Dark chocolate, date, cashew butter, vanilla bean, pink grapefruit zest. Gentle, sweetly brisk acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. Chocolaty finish supported by date and pink grapefruit zest. With milk, surprisingly bright — zest pink grapefruit is front and center with dark chocolate and date undertones.

A ready-to-drink black coffee, tested cold. Floral-toned, sweetly tart. Bing cherry, ginger, wisteria, pink grapefruit zest, allspice. High-toned, juicy acidity; light, crisp mouthfeel. Tart, spice-toned finish. Perfection with milk, where wisteria notes are amplified and Bing cherry and ginger harmonize with pink grapefruit zest.

A ready-to-drink black coffee, tested cold. Crisply cocoa-toned, sweetly nutty. Cocoa powder, walnut, Valencia orange, bay leaf, caramel. Juicy, malic (apple-like) acidity; velvety mouthfeel. Richly bittersweet, walnutty and cocoa-toned finish. With milk, cocoa notes are amplified and walnut tones sweeten.

A ready-to-drink black coffee, tested cold. Crisply sweet-savory. Baking chocolate, hop flowers, Brazil nut, almond, gently scorched oak. Round, quiet acidity; velvety mouthfeel. Nut-driven finish with bittersweet floral undertones. Pleasantly and gently smoky with milk, with nice notes of bittersweet florals and baking chocolate.

coffee_name: Nice Nitro Organic Black Cold Brew Coffee
review: A ready-to-drink black coffee, tested cold. Deep-toned, balanced. Date, salted caramel, walnut, orange zest, gently smoky cedar. Round, smooth acidity; crisp, fluffy mouthfeel. Richly bittersweet finish driven by walnut and orange zest notes. Slightly smoky cedar notes play nicely with milk, alongside date, salted caramel and walnut.

A ready-to-drink black coffee, tested cold. Sweet-toned, caramelly. Dark caramel, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, fresh-cut fir, nutmeg. Briskly sweet acidity; wood-framed, sweetly caramelly finish. Complex caramel notes dominate when milk is added, complementing the lingering lemon verbena and nutmeg.

Fruit-driven. Cranberry sauce, red grape, lychee, baking chocolate, cedar in aroma and cup. Gently sweet-tart acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Fruit-toned finish with notes of cranberry and red grape supported by baking chocolate and cedar.

coffee_name: Colombia Finca La Secreta Lychee Caturra Anaerobic
review: Floral-toned, richly fruity. Wisteria, lychee, kumquat, cocoa nib, marjoram in aroma and cup. High-toned, juicy acidity; viscous, syrupy mouthfeel. Very floral finish with cocoa undertones.

coffee_name: Reserve Costa Rica Don Noel SL28
review: Richly sweet-savory, brightly sweet. Mulberry, sassafras, green tomato, cane sugar, salted caramel in aroma and cup. Bright, citrusy acidity; crisp, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Savory-leaning finish with a tomato-like umami undercurrent.
Multi-layered, deeply sweet-tart. Candy apple, hibiscus tea, lemon verbena, cocoa nib, fresh-cut oak in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Very sweet, candy-like finish.
Richly aromatic, deep-toned. Raspberry, tangerine, cocoa nib, lilac, myrrh in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; very smooth, silky mouthfeel. Long, lingering, harmonious and integrated finish.

Floral-toned, tropical-leaning. Magnolia, guava, green banana, amber, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Juicy-sweet, malic acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned guava predominates in the quiet finish.

Very fruit-forward, richly sweet. Lychee, kiwi, nectarine, freesia, tangerine zest on aroma and cup. Juicy, bright acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Lychee-laden finish with spicy floral undertones.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Djimma Limu Gummay Baby Geisha G1 Washed
review: Vibrant, balanced, impeccably sweet. Apricot, cocoa nib, bergamot, wild honey, Thai basil in aroma and cup. Lilting acidity; exceptionally silky-smooth mouthfeel. Very long finish that integrates and carries over all aroma and flavor notes from the cup.

Richly fruit-forward, floral-toned. Tea rose, watermelon candy, tamarind, cedar, wild honey in aroma and cup. in aroma and cup. High-toned, juicy acidity; crisp, creamy mouthfeel. Tea rose and watermelon candy carry the perfumed finish.

coffee_name: Palo de Rosa Pink Bourbon Colombia
review: Juicy-tart, bright, vibrant. Pomegranate, neroli, cocoa nib, lemon verbena, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; elegantly silky mouthfeel. Flavor-saturated finish centered around notes of pomegranate and cocoa nib.

coffee_name: Colombia Rigoberto Herrera Granja La Esperanza Hybrid Washed Gesha
review: Lushly aromatic, deeply floral-toned. Wisteria, ginger blossom, nectarine, pink grapefruit, lemon balm in aroma and cup. Delicately bright, confident acidity; exceptionally silky-smooth mouthfeel. Notes of wisteria and ginger blossom harmonize alongside a throughline of nectarine and citrus undertones.

Deep-toned, crisply chocolaty. Baking chocolate, orange zest, lemon verbena, red plum, fresh-cut fir in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and orange zest.

Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly tart, intriguingly complex. Tamarind, Jolly Rancher, dark chocolate, hop flowers, hint of marjoram in aroma and small cup. Creamy-smooth mouthfeel; chocolaty-tart finish. Cappuccino format emphasis the marriage of sweet-tart-savory with bright fruit, candylike sweetness, and bittersweet floral undertones.

Deeply sweet, brightly tart. Raspberry, narcissus, baking chocolate, salted caramel, pomelo in aroma and cup. Even-keeled acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Fruity finish supported by narcissus and baking chocolate.

Richly aromatic, sweetly savory. Pineapple kefir, cocoa nib, lavender, pink grapefruit zest, lemon verbena in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-savory acidity; plush, satiny mouthfeel. Especially long, lingering finish that extends the promise of the cup.

Evaluated as espresso. Richly chocolaty, deeply sweet-savory. Cocoa powder, salted caramel, golden raisin, gently scorched mesquite, agave syrup in aroma and small cup. Velvety-smooth mouthfeel; wood-framed, chocolaty finish. In cappuccino format, richly sweet and cocoa-toned with a nice salted-caramel throughline.

Crisply nutty, sweet-toned. Cashew butter, caramel, baking chocolate, lily, fresh-cut fir in aroma and cup. Sweet, gentle acidity; full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Gently drying finish consolidates to notes of cashew and fir.

Very sweet, deep-toned. Dried plum, salted caramel, hazelnut, tangerine, magnolia in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Crisp, resonant finish centered around notes of dried plum and hazelnut.

Richly floral, sweetly herbaceous. Star jasmine, bay laurel, dark chocolate, frankincense, salted caramel in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of salted caramel and frankincense.

Juicy, sweet, fruit-saturated. Mulberry jam, dark chocolate, myrrh, pineapple kefir, black sage in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Notes of dark chocolate and mulberry commingle in the resonant finish.

Bright, zesty, floral-toned. Tangerine, narcissus, cocoa nib, palm sugar, cedar in aroma and cup. High-toned, citric acidity; gently satiny mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned tangerine notes lead in the finish, supported by hints of narcissus.

Bright, vibrant, sweetly tart. Meyer lemon, cocoa nib, date, thyme, redwood in aroma and cup. Tartly sweet acidity; plush, viscous mouthfeel. Notes of cocoa nib and Meyer lemon with thyme undertones in the finish.

Richly sweet, gently fruity. Bing cherry, toffee, narcissus, cedar, sassafras in aroma and cup. Brisk, sweet acidity; very full, creamy mouthfeel. Resonant finish centered around notes of toffee and narcissus.

Balanced, juicy, deep-toned. Dark chocolate, wisteria, apricot, hazelnut, coconut in aroma and cup. High-toned, sparkling acidity; very full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Long, harmonious, integrated finish that carries over the promise of the cup.

Citrusy-sweet, gently herbaceous. Meyer lemon, marjoram, black cherry, cedar, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Brightly sweet-tart, citrusy acidity; silky-smooth mouthfeel. Meyer lemon and cedar notes lead in the finish, with undertones of agave syrup.

Crisply sweet-tart. Pomegranate, baking chocolate, hazelnut, rhododendron, oak in aroma and cup. Bright, juicy acidity; crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of pomegranate and baking chocolate, supported by oak.

Richly fruit-forward, deeply aromatic. Ripe blueberry, tangerine, dark chocolate, cedar, magnolia in aroma and cup. Gently bright acidity; plush, creamy mouthfeel. Blueberry-driven finish supported by dark chocolate and cedar.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Sidama G4 Wamena Natural Espresso
review: Evaluated as espresso. Brightly sweet-tart, chocolaty. Pomegranate, dark chocolate, goji berry, almond butter, cedar in aroma and small cup. Plush, creamy mouthfeel; crisp, tartly chocolaty finish. In cappuccino format, dark berry notes take over from tart fruit while almond butter is amplified.

Richly spiced-toned, elegantly aromatic. Ginger blossom, nutmeg, lavender, lemon verbena, baking chocolate in aroma and cup. Malic (apple-like) acidity; silky, viscous mouthfeel. Spice-toned finish into the long.

coffee_name: Colombia Cauca Finca EI Paraiso 92 Pink Bourbon
review: Brightly sweet, deeply fruit- and cocoa-toned. Raspberry jam, dark chocolate, thyme, peach, frankincense in aroma and cup. Balanced, vibrant acidity;very silky, very smooth mouthfeel. Jammy cocoa-toned finish.

Richly floral-toned, deeply fruity. Passionfruit, tea rose, frangipane, cocoa nib, pineapple kefir in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright, balanced acidity; delicate, silky-smooth mouthfeel. Tea rose and cocoa nib carry the crisp finish.

Floral-toned. Narcissus, orange zest, dark chocolate, marjoram, lychee in aroma and cup. Very sweet structure with brisk acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Crisply chocolaty finish supported by notes of dusky marjoram and orange zest.

Delicately fruity, crisply nut-toned. Mulberry, hazelnut, baking chocolate, orange zest, cedar in aroma and cup. Gently brisk acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Mulberry and baking chocolate are supported by hazelnut in the quiet finish.
Very sweet, complexly fruit-forward. Red plum, mango, freesia, cocoa nib, nougat in aroma and cup. Sparkling acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned, fruity finish.

coffee_name: Costa Rica Hacienda Copey Black Honey
review: Gently fruity, richly sweet. Goji berry, amber, cocoa nib, tangerine, lilac in aroma and cup. Delicate, round acidity; syrupy, viscous mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by rich amber impulses.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Kercha Sakicha Red Honey 74112
review: Sweetly savory, nicely crisp. Pomegranate, freesia, pistachio, oak, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Tart-leaning structure with brisk acidity; crisp, creamy mouthfeel. Gently drying finish centered around notes of pistachio and oak.

Balanced, bright, nut-toned. Hazelnut, cocoa nib, nougat, cedar, freesia in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Solid finish that leads with hazelnut and cocoa nib with freesia undertones.

coffee_name: Colombia Mokka Anaerobic Natural Finca Hawaii
review: Sweetly spice-toned, complex and satiatingly fruity. Black cherry kombucha, clove, pipe tobacco, molasses in aroma and cup. Lively, sparkling acidity; creamy, lithe mouthfeel. Incredibly long, harmonious, integrated finish.

Crisply sweet, chocolaty. Cocoa powder, date, Brazil nut, lily, fir in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Gently drying, wood-framed finish with notes of date and cocoa powder.

Sweetly spice-toned, crisply nutty. Cashew butter, nutmeg, caramel, orange zest, hint of mace in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Quiet nut-driven finish with undertones of orange zest.

High-toned, tropical, exquisitely balanced. Orange blossom, cocoa nib, guava, young ginger, cedar in aroma and cup. Juicy-bright yet delicate acidity; silky-smooth mouthfeel. Long, resonant finish that fulfills the promise of the cup.

Evaluated as espresso. Crisply cocoa-toned, sweetly nutty. Cocoa powder, walnut, molasses, pie cherry, fir in aroma and small cup. Taut, lightly satiny mouthfeel; gently drying, wood-framed finish. In cappuccino format, richly chocolaty with undertones of walnut and molasses.

Balanced, juicy, sweetly tart. Pomegranate, lychee, honey, amber, cocoa nib in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-tart acidity; plush, syrupy mouthdeel. Fruit-driven finish supported by amber and cocoa nib.

Gently tart, delicately high-toned. Meyer lemon zest, cocoa nib, narcissus, agave syrup, fresh-cut oak in aroma and cup. Balanced, malic (apple-like) acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of sweet citrus and cocoa nib.

coffee_name: Karen J Kona Red Bourbon Anaerobic
review: Complex, richly nuanced. Narcissus, cocoa nib, pear, wild honey, amber in aroma and cup. Invigorating, malic acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Very long-lasting, floral-toned, richly sweet finish.
Fruit-driven, richly floral. Boysenberry, lilac, cocoa nib, honey, cedar in aroma and cup. Winy acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Fruity, floral finish with undertones of cocoa nib, cedar and honey.

coffee_name: Black Basalt Dark Roast Blend Espresso
review: Evaluated as espresso. Crisply chocolaty, rich-toned. Baking chocolate, scorched mesquite, freesia, date, cashew in aroma and cup. Crisp, velvety mouthfeel; sweetly smoky, chocolaty finish. Chocolaty, nut-toned finish. In cappuccino format, rich, almost fudgelike chocolate predominates.

Bright, richly sweet-tart. Bing cherry, pink grapefruit zest, magnolia, cocoa nib, maple syrup in aroma and cup. Juicy structure with high-toned acidity; crisp, silky mouthfeel. The lingering finish fulfills the promise of the cup, complex and satiating.

Richly sweet-savory, citrusy. Cocoa nib, hop flowers, almond, magnolia, key lime in aroma and cup. Crisp, citric acidity; viscous, satiny mouthfeel. Magnolia and cocoa nib are front and center in the gentle finish.

Juicy-bright, sweetly tart. Red plum, tamarind, almond, tangerine zest, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Citrusy, high-toned acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Tangerine zest and agave syrup lead in the resonant finish.

Evaluated as espresso. Chocolaty, quietly fruit-toned. Baking chocolate, goji berry, lemon verbena, nasturtium, fir in aroma and small cup. Creamy-rich mouthfeel; crisp, spice-toned, wood-framed finish. In three parts milk, balanced, sweetly chocolaty with undertones of goji berry and lemon verbena.

Evaluated as espresso. Deeply sweet, richly savory. Dark chocolate, salted almond nougat, tangerine zest, cedar, sorghum syrup in aroma and small cup. Crisp, lightly satiny mouthfeel; chocolaty finish with cedar undertones. In cappuccino format,  tangerine zest notes are a good counterpoint to sweet dark chocolate.

Sweet, tart, distinctly spice-toned. Guava, shishito peppers, basil, rhododendron, cedar in aroma and cup. Savory-leaning acidity; very smooth, syrupy mouthfeel. Crisp, spice-toned finish with floral undertones.

Sweetly nut-toned, delicately bright. Pistachio, cocoa powder, red grape, cedar, hint of tarragon in aroma and cup. Brislky sweet acidity; full, satiny mouthfeel. Cocoa-toned finish supported by notes of pistachio and red grape.

Richly sweet-savory. Red currant, hop flowers, lychee, toffee, cedar in aroma and cup. Gently bright, balanced acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Finish leads with notes of toffee and lychee, supported by cedar.

Evaluated as espresso. Rich-toned, crisply chocolaty. Baking chocolate, pralines, black cherry, pink grapefruit, almond butter in aroma and small cup. Full, velvety mouthfeel; chocolaty, gently citrusy finish. In cappuccino format, both chocolaty and bright.

coffee_name: Thailand Chaiprakarn Black Honey Single Origin Espresso
review:
Evaluated as espresso. Savory-sweet with a tart edge. Delicate chocolate
and lemon, apricot, fir, savory-edged blackberry in aroma and small cup. In mouthfeel, full though rather dense in texture. Clean, rich, simple finish. In three-parts milk, straightforward, chocolate-toned.

coffee_name: Colombia Wilder Lasso Geisha Lot 2 Anaerobic Washed
review: Elegantly fruit-forward, richly aromatic. Strawberry guava, lychee, cocoa nib, amber, ginger blossom in aroma and cup. Brightly sweet, gently tart, balanced acidity; vibrant, silky-smooth mouthfeel. Harmonious, resonant, coherent finish.

Balanced, juicy, bright. Dried cherry, sassafras, honey, almond, freesia in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Very long, deeply aromatic finish that carries over all the flavor notes from the cup.

Evaluated as espresso. Crisply chocolate, delicately floral. Lilac, baking chocolate, hazelnut, orange zest, cedar in aroma and small cup. Lightly satiny mouthfeel; chocolaty finish with hints of orange zest. In cappuccino format, floral notes are amplified in harmony with baking chocolate.

Evaluated as espresso. Richly sweet, deep-toned. Date, pomegranate, chocolate fudge, gently scorched cedar, tangerine zest in aroma and small cup. Plush, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel; chocolaty, sweetly tart finish. In cappuccino format, pomegranate notes stand up to milk and chocolate lingers on and on.

Rich-toned, deeply chocolaty. Dark chocolate, cashew, key lime, magnolia, cedar in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Chocolaty, sweetly nutty finish with undertones of magnolia, cedar and key lime.

Crisply sweet-tart, spice-toned. Cinnamon candy, lime zest, baking chocolate, walnut, brown sugar in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Spice-toned finish with walnut undertones.

Impressively floral-toned, berry driven. Black raspberry, magnolia, marjoram, tangerine zest, amber in aroma and cup. Tart-leaning but balanced acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Exceptionally floral finish supported by berry and tangerine notes.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Washed Guji Uraga Haro Adama
review: Bright, juicy, balanced. Apricot, almond butter, star jasmine, bergamot, cedar in aroma and cup. Sparkling, vibrant acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Long, flavor-saturated finish that extends the promise of the cup.

Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly tart, gently earthy. Blackberry, baking chocolate, lemon verbena, pipe tobacco, fresh-cut fir in aroma and small cup. Crisp, velvety mouthfeel; earthy-sweet, citrusy-herbal finish. In three parts milk, notes of pipe tobacco and lemon verbena harmonize, supported by baking chocolate.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Washed Kaffa Lot Rich Espresso
review: Evaluated as espresso. Richly chocolaty, deeply sweet-savory. Black cherry, hop flowers, magnolia, date, hint of teriyaki in aroma and small cup.  Creamy mouthfeel; floral finish with savory undertones. In cappuccino format, savory impulses are all but subsumed in sweet floral notes.

Evaluated as espresso. Deeply sweet, crisply chocolaty. Dark chocolate, date, almond, maple syrup, cedar in aroma and small cup. Crisp, satiny mouthfeel; chocolaty, nut-toned finish. In cappuccino format, rich-toned and deeply chocolaty.

Gently aromatic, multi-layered. Candycap mushroom, rhododendron, lilac, cocoa nib, lychee in aroma and cup. Even-keeled, juicy acidity; very full, satiny-smooth mouthfeel. Umami finish akin to candycap mushroom with  pleasing undertones of cocoa nib.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Natural Sidama Karamo Niguse Gemeda 74158
review: Delicately sweet-tart, subtly nuanced. Cocoa nib, raspberry jam,  lemon balm, nougat, ginger blossom in aroma and cup. High-toned, balanced acidity; silky, viscous mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to cocoa-toned raspberry with hints of ginger blossom.

coffee_name: Rainy Season in Fort Zeelandia Espresso Blend
review: Evaluated as espresso. Complex, multi-toned. Chocolate fudge, black cherry, almond blossom, sandalwood, pipe tobacco in aroma and small cup. Full, syrupy mouthfeel; very sweet, chocolaty finish. In three parts milk, richly complex with wide-ranging floral and fruit notes, all supported by deep chocolate.

Evaluated as espresso. Richly savory-sweet. Candycap mushroom, roasted cashew, kiwi, amber, baking chocolate in aroma and small cup. Crisp, satiny mouthfeel; umami-driven finish with notes of candycap mushroom and amber. In cappuccino format, chocolate notes assume center stage, supported by kiwi and cashew.

coffee_name: Guatemala Natural Finca El General Bourbon/Catuai
review: Balanced, sweetly nutty, gently tart. Pomegranate, hazelnut, baking chocolate, cedar, agave syrup in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; very full, syrupy mouthfeel. Quiet finish settles into notes of baking chocolate and pomegranate.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Hambella Strawberry Truffles Kurume G1 Natural
review: Richly bittersweet. Candied walnut, black sage, sesame, palm sugar, dried persimmon in aroma and cup. Delicately rich, tart acidity; vibrant, silky mouthfeel. Nut-toned finish with undertones of black sage.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Guji Uraga Pear Gummies G1 Washed
review: Cocoa-toned, sweetly fermenty. Orange zest, cocoa nib, grappa barrel, pink peppercorn, lilac in aroma and cup. Zesty, pert acidity; very full, velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Sweetly fermenty, grappa-barrel finish.

coffee_name: Kenya Nyeri Kianjogu AA TOP Washed
review: Bright, juicy, richly sweet-savory. Black currant, shiitake mushroom, amber, lilac, Meyer lemon zest in aroma and cup. High-toned, apple-like acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. Citrusy, floral finish.
Richly sweet, spice-toned. Cashew butter, pomelo, black sage, green apple, fine musk in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; velvety mouthfeel. Exceptionally harmonious, integrated finish.

Multi-layered, richly sweet. Black cherry, baking chocolate, magnolia, pink grapefruit zest, oak in aroma and cup. Sweetly tart with brisk acidity; syrupy-smooth, vibrant mouthfeel. Pink grapefruit and baking chocolate in the finish.

Evaluated as espresso. Crisply chocolaty, rich-toned. Baking chocolate, caramel, pomegranate, lily, cedar in aroma and small cup. Velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Caramelly, gently tart finish. In cappuccino format, nicely chocolaty with lily and cedar undertones.

Evaluated as espresso. Bright, vibrant, chocolaty. Dark chocolate, magnolia, red currant, cedar, lemon verbena in aroma and small cup. Crisp, satiny-smooth mouthfeel; chocolaty, citrusy-herbaceous finish. In cappuccino format, rich-toned, chocolaty and floral.

Deeply chocolaty, floral-toned. Dark chocolate, lilac, hazelnut butter, apricot, tangerine in aroma and cup. Balanced, bright acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. The finish leads with notes of lilac and dark chocolate.

Sweetly nut-toned. Pistachio, baking chocolate, orange zest, agave syrup, nutmeg in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; lightly satiny mouthfeel. Nut-toned finish with hints of orange zest and baking chocolate.

Multi-layered, richly complex. Pomegranate, dried pineapple, cocoa nib, marjoram, wisteria in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet, fruity acidity; full, creamy-smooth mouthfeel. Long, resonant, flavor-laden finish.

Delicately sweet-savory. Date, hop flowers, agave syrup, tamarind, fresh-cut fir in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet-savory acidity; velvety-smooth mouthfeel. Finish centers around notes of date and tamarind with undertones of fir.

Sweetly nut-toned, citrusy. Orange zest, hazelnut, baking chocolate, lily, oak in aroma and cup. High-toned, juicy acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Finish consolidates to notes of baking chocolate and cedar.

Evaluated as espresso. Sweetly tart, richly chocolaty. Cocoa powder, Fig Newton, black cherry, cedar, hazelnut in aroma and small cup. Crisp, sattiny mouthfeel; cocoa-toned, nutty finish. In cappuccino format, richly sweet and fruit-driven.
Balanced, crisply sweet. Lemon verbena, almond, dark caramel, freesia, cedar in aroma and cup. Sweet-toned acidity; full, very satiny mouthfeel. Notes of freesia and almond lead in the sweet finish.

Crisply chocolaty, sweetly citrusy. Dark chocolate, pink grapefruit zest, tamarind, fresh-cut oak, magnolia in aroma and cup. Briskly sweet acidity; full, syrupy mouthfeel. Chocolaty, floral-toned finish.

Evaluated as espresso. Co-taster John DiRuocco and Ken both found a sweetly tangy intrigue animating this plush, satiny bodied espresso, and rewarded it with 95s. Ken called it rich pistachio; John favored musky, mango-like tropical fruit. For both tasters, the pistachio/mango notes impressively sweetened and moved forward in three parts milk.

Evaluated as espresso. Sweet grapefruit and orange blossom notes shimmer inside a deeply expressed chocolate in aroma and cup. Velvety mouthfeel. Ken and co-taster John DiRuocco shared parallel descriptors and the same 95-point enthusiasm for this poised, resonantly finishing espresso. Floral-toned chocolate with a continued grapefruit hint graces three parts milk.

Evaluated as espresso. This was Ken’s favorite in the tasting; he had it at 96 with a 10 for aroma. Co-taster John DiRuocco was a bit less enthusiastic at 94. The difference may have been their reading of the striking floral herb notes. Ken experienced them as exhilarating sweet lavender while John read them as a pleasant but drier eucalyptus. But both overall admired this sweetly citrusy, walnut-toned, brightly chocolaty espresso whose character resonates through the finish and retains character impressively in three parts milk.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Anaerobic Washed G1 Wild Rose S.O. Sidamo
review: Evaluated as espresso. Ripe, berryish fruit hints at brandy in this lush yet tartly dry espresso that reveals its rounder chocolate side in the cup. Ken (93) decided to like its intensity and tart fruit sweetness. Co-cupper John DiRuocco went more decisively to the bright side at 94. Convincing in three parts milk: crisp chocolate with a juicy, fruit-toned finish.

coffee_name: Ethiopia Growers Reserve Gesha Village Gaylee Special Fermentation
review: Evaluated as espresso. Resonant, layered berry (blueberry, raspberry), vanilla-toned flowers, papaya, a hint of cinnamon jostle in aroma and in the cup, where aromatics are suspended in a layered structure of complex bitter, sweet, tart and savory tastes. Ken (94) liked this velvety, viscous espresso a bit better than co-taster John DiRuocco (93). The complexity consolidates a bit in three parts milk, where flavor settles in with quiet certainty around a pronounced chocolate.

Evaluated as espresso. Ken (94) found this anaerobic natural Kona luxurious with deep floral notes and softly subtle chocolate and orange. Co-taster John DiRuocco (93) concurred but was bothered by what he regarded as a very slight overripe edge to the fruit. Both found the mouthfeel medium in weight but impressively plush in texture, and the shot in three parts milk delicately complex with flowers, fruit and chocolate working in layered coherence.

coffee_name: El Salvador Finca Loma La Gloria Natural Process “Unicorn Lot”
review: Evaluated as espresso. Chocolate, mango and sweet lime animate this satiny bodied espresso. Impressive stone-fruit sweetness is complicated by an engaging resiny edge co-taster John DiRuocco (94) and Ken (93) both associated with mango. Mango and chocolate crisply and sweetly persist in three parts milk.

coffee_name: Colombia El Diviso Nestor Lasso Sidra Anaerobic Washed
review: Evaluated as espresso. Lots of flowers with an herby edge—lavender, jasmine, orange blossom, cilantro—cushion on milk chocolate in this bright, light-footed espresso.
